summary: Free solitaire games! Like Spider, FreeCell, Klondike & Pyramid - but more fun!
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Fall into the Lost Leaves Scavenger Hunt!
‚Ä¢ Flowers are always in season for the Lei of the Orchid Luau!
‚Ä¢ Bone up for Bailey‚Äôs Bash - 6 Trials in 48 Hours!
‚Ä¢ Haunted Mini Tikis? You‚Äôll see ‚Äòem in the upcoming Seasonal event!
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes: We exorcise the bugs when we find ‚Äòem! If you see any, let us know!
comments: Don't waste your time. It will be fun in the beginning but will get frustrating as you advance. It becomes extremely difficult to win. I have played the same level over 15 times to win and its impossible. I've went from having 90,000 coins to less than 3000 just trying to solve the same level (each game cost 3000 coins to play). I usually don't post comments, but this app made me do it.

I love this game but why so much for each level? Also, 6000 coins for 5 cards?! Half the time those cards do not have the cards you need so you spent 6000 coins for nothing. I love this game but I'm finding myself spending an obscene amount of money just to pass levels I've been stuck on for days! It seems like the higher the level the less cards they give you. The boosts cost 6000 coins each which is ridiculous. No more will I spend my money on this game which is clearly what they want.

2nd review. Again, it's a beautiful game but the decks aren't legitimate and I know in my gut that the cards are changing to make you keep spending your bank and each hand costs more and more, it takes the fun away from the game. It's not honest. I just won 5000 coins and I didn't get them. I watched that corner and it never changed. Shame.

Love this game . But for some reason it's having problems loading my progress this morning. I have restarted my phone. I have restarted the game several times and it's still stuck in the mode of loading my progress. I have almost 190,000 coins that I hate to lose if I have to uninstall and reinstall the game. My Wi-Fi is up and running well so that is not the issue. You have told players to go to menu and then ask for help. If you can't get into the game you can't go to menu and ask for help.

I downloaded this game as a reward offer was promised after completing level 65. I am currently on level 70 and they refuse to grant the reward of diamonds in the game app that it advertised and offered reward in. Beware...if you are looking to install this game for a promised reward for reaching a certain level then know they do not honor that promise!

title: Your Phone Companion - Link to Windows
description:
You love your phone. So does your PC. Get instant access to everything you love on your phone, right on your PC. To get started, Install the Your Phone Companion - Link to Windows app on your Android phone and link it with the Your Phone app on your Windows 10 PC.

Reply to your text messages with ease, access your favorite mobile apps*, and receive and manage your phone‚Äôs notifications on your PC. Make and receive calls** on your PC and transfer them between your devices effortlessly. Make emailing yourself photos a thing of the past as you share your favorite images between your phone and PC. And, when you need to add a recent image to your email, paper, or presentation, just drag and drop it from the Your Phone app to your PC. You can also wirelessly drag and drop files from your phone to your PC and vice versa with supported Samsung phones***. 

Your Phone Companion features:
‚Ä¢ Make and receive calls from your PC
‚Ä¢ Manage your Android phone's notifications on your PC 
‚Ä¢ Access your favorite mobile apps* on your PC. Enjoy your PC‚Äôs bigger screen, keyboard, mouse, and touch screen.
‚Ä¢ Read and reply to your text messages from your PC
‚Ä¢ Drag files between your PC and phone***
‚Ä¢ Instantly access the photos on your phone from your PC

 Integrated with select Samsung mobile devices for an even better experience   
‚Ä¢ Select Samsung models have Link to Windows integrated and it does not need to be downloaded from the Play Store. See list of supported devices: https://aka.ms/YPLTWdevices
‚Ä¢ Find Link to Windows in  Settings , under  Advanced features > Link to Windows . You can also see it in the Quick Access tray (drag down from the top of your screen to access it).  
‚Ä¢ This integration enables unique features such as Phone Screen and Drag & Drop. 

Discover new Microsoft apps
‚Ä¢ Find apps for your phone and PC that help you seamlessly work across devices.
‚Ä¢ Discover new Microsoft apps that help you be more productive, focus in school, keep up with world events, and more.
Your Phone features are available for Android phones running Android 7.0 or greater. You have to link your Android Phone to your PC through the Your Phone app. 

*Requires a Windows 10 PC running the Windows 10 May 2019 Update and is available only on select Android phones. Android phone must be turned on and connected to the same WiFi network as your PC.  Here‚Äôs a list of phones that are currently supported: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2066472

**Requires a Windows 10 PC running the Windows 10 May 2019 Update and with a Bluetooth radio. 

***Requires a Windows 10 PC running the October 2018 Update. You must also be using a phone that supports phone screen. Check out the full list of supported devices here: https://aka.ms/YPLTWdevices

By installing this app, you agree to the Terms of Use https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=246338 and Privacy Policy https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248686

Tell us what features you'd like to see next by selecting "Send feedback" in settings in the Your Phone app or the Your Phone Companion app.

summary: Access your phone‚Äôs notifications, calls, apps, photos & texts on your PC.
recentChanges: Now you can make and receive calls on your PC and transfer them between your devices effortlessly. Tap into your PC's speakers, microphone, and larger screen for a richer calling experience. You can also now view and interact with your most recent 2,000 photos from your Android smartphone's camera roll on your PC, instead of only 25!
comments: Used to be perfect. Everything was working fine until the updates came. All of a sudden I am unable to connect my phone to PC. Both devices are on the same network. Disabled my firewall just to see if it was the one causing the problem to no avail. Reinstalled both on my PC and phone, still didn't work. Even tried relogging into my Microsoft account on both devices, still didn't work. This was the same for the Microsoft Launcher. Stay away. Both software are unusable unless the bugs are fixed.

Awful, it doesn't work 90% of the time. It disconnects for no reason, says that you aren't on the same network when you are, etc. I found a fix for this by restarting the app on pc but now that doesn't work anymore because I can't even open the app. Everytime I try to open it(on pc) it starts with the normal loading screen but then it just minimizes itself and I can't open it again. I've tried restarting, different wifis, redownloading and checked for updates. Nothing works. Terrible app!

Just like many other reviews. Used to be perfect. Everything was working fine until the updates came. All of a sudden I am unable to connect my phone to PC. Both devices are on the same network. Reinstalled both applications on my PC and phone. On the OPC side it seemed to hang at 60% on my my phone it said select send notification, this will send the final permission to your phone but, because the PC was stuck at 60% I could never select this option.

The app regularly decides not to communicate with the laptop. The "advice" is worthless. When it works, I love it. I cannot depend on it at all. I have updated, reinstalled, opened settings and turned things off and back on again. It still randomly disconnects and refuses to reconnect. Then one day, it works again. Don't rely on this app.

Went through the setup process fine, but it's never successfully connected since. Both devices are on the same network. Tried to look up the error code on the Microsoft support page, but the page keeps auto-appending "Your Phone app" onto the search terms I enter and giving me useless results. I don't normally take the time to review apps, but this one is a terrible experience the whole way through. Seeing "Rate us 5 stars" at the top of the system menu was what pushed me to it.

comments: Scam, avoid at all costs. Has ads that cannot be closed, so there is no way to use this app. When I click on the ad it redirects me to a page that days I installed something with a weird name. Very suspicious. Even then, the ad doesn't close. So there's literally no way to get to the editor.

Surprisingly effective if used in moderation. Need to be careful to avoid arms if shaping a waist, but if used for small adjustments it looks very natural. The pop-up ads for other apps are annoying, but it's a free app, so perhaps shouldn't complain - but it typically takes 10+ clicks to exit the App.

High potential, but creates pixelated photo after a few edits. The interface is really easy to use and the editing is robust, but like I said, the quality of the resultant photo is severely degraded after a few layers of edits, for some reason.
Wonderful and wow!. It is really a surprise that I can change the shape of my body without having to do exercise. It is rather convenient when I can't exercise for producing great photos

I think that if ya'll remove the watermark then I will give it 5 stars, and if u want 5 stars you should remove it üòä

title: Microsoft Teams
description:
Microsoft Teams is your hub for teamwork, which brings together everything a team needs: chat and threaded conversations, meetings & video conferencing, calling, content collaboration with the power of Microsoft 365 applications, and the ability to create and integrate apps and workflows that your business relies on.

You can now also use Microsoft Teams to manage your personal life - chat, make plans, share shopping lists, tasks and even your location, coordinate events with fellow club or family members and make decisions quickly. Teams provides a single hub to help you stay connected, get organized and bring balance to your entire life.

Easily‚ÄØmove between your work and personal account to stay organized‚ÄØthroughout the day. Whether you‚Äôre sprinting towards a deadline or helping your kids with their homework, Teams can help you achieve more.

Connect & Communicate
‚Ä¢ Chat 1-1, use group messages or dedicated channels to communicate with the entire team**
‚Ä¢ HD audio and video calls for scheduled face-to-face meetings from almost anywhere**
‚Ä¢ Mention individual team members, or the whole team at once, to get your colleagues‚Äô attention**
‚Ä¢ To-do lists, calendars, and cloud storage access right in group chats
‚Ä¢ Personal chats, documents, & files can be securely accessed 

Organize Your Whole Life
‚Ä¢ File sharing & editing on the go makes managing your work projects a breeze**
‚Ä¢ Intelligent search finds documents, spreadsheets, & photos in chats and team conversations ** 
‚Ä¢ Custom notifications give you control to stay focus on what matters most** 
‚Ä¢ Work calendar & personal calendar both in one app
‚Ä¢ Group dashboards to view important items, shared locations, & upcoming tasks within a group chat

Safety & Security
‚Ä¢ Enterprise-level security and compliance you expect from Microsoft 365** 
‚Ä¢ Location sharing to let colleagues, friends and family know where you are*
‚Ä¢ Storage in the Safe where you and your group can store, access, and share important data like passwords, frequent flier miles or your hotel reward number

*Must be enabled and active

**Commercial features of this app require a paid Microsoft 365 commercial subscription, or a trial subscription of Microsoft Teams for work. If you‚Äôre not sure about your company‚Äôs subscription or the services you have access to, visit Office.com/Teams to learn more or contact your IT department.

By downloading Teams, you agree to the license (see aka.ms/eulateamsmobile) and privacy terms (see aka.ms/privacy). For support or feedback, email us at mtandapp@microsoft.com

comments: My experience with this app was really great. Its the perfect app for online study and calls. I just have one suggestion. Sometimes when we are asked a question which has a yes/no answer but its not always possible to unmute and answer so if its possible can we get a yes/no option for fast and direct response.

Works very poor on mobile phone app when it comes to Teams calls. One can only listen and not speak well on a Teams call while using the mobile app. Also when searching for a message, it takes to the latest messages in the conversation and not that particular message being searched. Works on heavy data transfer.

It is a really good app. I hope you continue to update it and make it better. But there is one problem. Since the starting of this week, there is a glitch for the teachers in the school that disallows them to join the meeting and sometimes even the app. I have given it Four stars cause it is very annoying and we students can't study properly. If this situation is fixed I will give it a five I swear.

Great Online Meeting App.. But there is this thing that I would like to request the developers to add in Teams that there should be an option to delete an entire conversation with a specific person. We have to delete every single message to vanish the whole chat. Try to add this feature also to make it work more flexibly Overall nice application.. keep it up üëçüèªü§üüèª

Teams is a good app. But there is a problem with the app. The app was fine but after the latest update, I can't join any meeting. I have a stable network. I tried signing out and signing in, but that also didn't work. Whenever I click on join button, it is showing that, "Your call dropped and we couldn't reconnect". So, I deleted it and installed an old problem free version. Edited : Now there is no problem after updating to the latest version. Thanks for solving the issues.

Whether you‚Äôre learning a language for travel, school, career, family and friends, or your brain health, you‚Äôll love learning with Duolingo.

recentChanges: New on Android: language tips! Tap the Tips icon next to certain skills to get helpful explanations of grammar, pronunciation and useful phrases. Now available in our Spanish, French and Chinese courses, with more to come!
comments: I loved this app before the recent update!!! Before you could practice for hours and actually get somewhere with your learning. You could make mistakes and it would push you to get it right and that was so encouraging and rewarding and you felt like you were getting somewhere. Now with the hearts, as soon as you make 5 mistakes, thats it, end of session. Awful and very deflating. Yes I could pay to upgrade, but thats ¬£7 a month, over ¬£80 for a year!!!! Very very disappointed.

Fix the problem when we change email, the app keeps remembering the previous email. Create the option to delete courses or organize them by preference. The heart system is terrible, remove it. The application has too many bugs for silly things, it does not load the option to follow, sometimes the audio doesn't work. I don't uninstall it because they asked me to use it at school, but this app is terrible.

I can only recommend the Desk Top version of Duolingo, and even that is marginal. The mobile app is cumbersome and frustrating with having to earn and buy errors, unless you spring for the Pay version. Their slogan used to be "Make learning fun and free." Wll, let me tell you, the new Hearts system is not fun. And, I think their new update is solely intended to make people buy the Plus version. Also, both versions have some of the silliest sentences to translate. Why learn them if they have no purpose? I think there are better, more efficient ways to learn a new language.

The recent update to this app has made things unacceptable. The introduction of a 'hearts' system (when you get 5 things wrong in a row, you can't progress for the rest of the day) is anathema to the process of learning. What's more, I'm relatively sure the developers changed the accepted fields of words for answers smaller (phone is no longer an alternative to 'cell phone', an Americanism used nowhere outside of the United States). This is to push users into buying a subscription. Awful.

Very disappointed with the update to the heart system. It's to slow people down? Then just limit the number of lessons per day instead of hearts, but allow unlimited practice sessions. I'm learning nothing now because it feels like a test and I get too much anxiety with those. Mistakes are NORMAL when learning a new language! Even those who speak a second language for many years still make mistakes. Who cares if people go too fast? Worry about those who don't and use the app appropriately]!]

title: Smule: Social Karaoke Singing
description:
Sing karaoke with a community of music lovers over 50M+ strong! Choose from a massive library of hits and sing along a capella, duet, or in a group performance with whatever song matches your mood. From slow love songs to upbeat power pop, Smule offers a genre and style for everyone! Looking to sing along with today‚Äôs hottest stars? Smule offers duet options where you sing alongside your favorite singers like Demi Lovato and Jason Derulo too! Use high-quality studio effects to enhance your singing and highlight your performance. Download now and start singing free!
 
FEATURES
Sing karaoke free with over 10 million+ songs across multiple genres
Record solo, duet, group, or a capella 
Sing karaoke duets with celebs like Ed Sheeran, Lewis Capaldi, Luis Fonsi, Demi Lovato, & more
Sing along with Disney characters from Frozen, Moana, Little Mermaid & more
Add audio + visual effects with pre-made Styles or use the Style Studio app to make your own

LET'S MUSIC TOGETHER‚Ñ¢

With new songs added daily, you‚Äôll find your fave songs and karaoke hits. Choose from a karaoke songbook of Pop, R&B, Rock, Rap, Hip-Hop, Country, Latin, K-pop and more!

CONNECTING THE WORLD THROUGH MUSIC‚Ñ¢
We believe music is more than just listening‚Äîit's a way to create, share, discover, and connect with others. It‚Äôs the original social network with the power to break down barriers, touch souls and bring together people from all over the world.
Join our global community of music lovers. Sing karaoke or a cappella! Get discovered and grow your audience! Connect to Facebook to make music with your friends! Try it free.
 
FIND YOUR VOICE
Every genre and type of singer is welcome at Smule. We need your unique voice! Use mic effects and video edits to autotune, add reverb and smooth over imperfections. If you love karaoke, singing along to radio songs, a cappella in the shower, dream of singing duets with pop stars, or simply love music‚Äîtry it free now!
 
FOLLOW US and keep up with new major artists and featured singers on Smule
http://www.smule.com

http://www.youtube.com/smule

descriptionHTML:
Sing karaoke with a community of music lovers over 50M+ strong! Choose from a massive library of hits and sing along a capella, duet, or in a group performance with whatever song matches your mood. From slow love songs to upbeat power pop, Smule offers a genre and style for everyone! Looking to sing along with today‚Äôs hottest stars? Smule offers duet options where you sing alongside your favorite singers like Demi Lovato and Jason Derulo too! Use high-quality studio effects to enhance your singing and highlight your performance. Download now and start singing free!

FEATURES
Sing karaoke free with over 10 million+ songs across multiple genres
Record solo, duet, group, or a capella
Sing karaoke duets with celebs like Ed Sheeran, Lewis Capaldi, Luis Fonsi, Demi Lovato, & more
Sing along with Disney characters from Frozen, Moana, Little Mermaid & more
Add audio + visual effects with pre-made Styles or use the Style Studio app to make your own
Gifts help you give back to your favorite performances & show community support
Automatic pitch correction (autotune) complements and polishes your singing voice
Sing Live lets you sing and perform LIVE with friends and other music lovers around the world
Record your songs with vocals and then video to make your own music video
Practice & improve your singing with as many retakes as you want
Over 50M+ singers and music lovers in the global Smule community
Share your talent and passion for singing with your friends + family on social media - Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, WhatsApp, Snapchat etc.

LET'S MUSIC TOGETHER‚Ñ¢

With new songs added daily, you‚Äôll find your fave songs and karaoke hits. Choose from a karaoke songbook of Pop, R&B, Rock, Rap, Hip-Hop, Country, Latin, K-pop and more!
SING POP HITS & BALLADS
* Despacito - Luis Fonsi
* Say You Won‚Äôt Let Go - James Arthur
* Shape of You - Ed Sheeran
SING NEW CLASSICS & KARAOKE ESSENTIALS
* Killing Me Softly - The Fugees
* I Will Survive - Gloria Gaynor
* Happy - Pharrell Williams
SING MUSICALS & SOUNDTRACKS
* Beauty and the Beast - Beauty and the Beast (Disney)
* Part of Your World - The Little Mermaid (Disney)
* Let It Go - Idina Menzel (Frozen by Disney)
Fave karaoke song missing? Upload hit songs and music to the Songbook
https://www.smule.com/support/upload#songbook

CONNECTING THE WORLD THROUGH MUSIC‚Ñ¢
We believe music is more than just listening‚Äîit's a way to create, share, discover, and connect with others. It‚Äôs the original social network with the power to break down barriers, touch souls and bring together people from all over the world.
Join our global community of music lovers. Sing karaoke or a cappella! Get discovered and grow your audience! Connect to Facebook to make music with your friends! Try it free.

FIND YOUR VOICE
Every genre and type of singer is welcome at Smule. We need your unique voice! Use mic effects and video edits to autotune, add reverb and smooth over imperfections. If you love karaoke, singing along to radio songs, a cappella in the shower, dream of singing duets with pop stars, or simply love music‚Äîtry it free now!

FOLLOW US and keep up with new major artists and featured singers on Smule
http://www.smule.com
http://www.facebook.com/smule
http://www.youtube.com/smule
http://www.twitter.com/smule
Have questions? http://www.smule.com/support/sing#android
This app has been Superpowered
summary: Enjoy karaoke on your phone. Sing karaoke with top artists & friends!

recentChanges:
Regularly Scheduled Maintenance
Routine upkeep for less downtime, and more singing
comments: Such a shame. This app was amazing, but the latest update has messed everything up. Settings are clunky, sound effects are forced on you that make a recording sound ridiculous, and the video effects on group collaborations are awful. Finished recordings often end up completely different to what you see during the preview. You've taken away all the joy of this as a musical singing app. It doesn't feel like any testing was done before releasing this latest update. Poor.

Dear team smule, after the recent update, the lovely feel of the app is lost. To describe briefly, the settings in terms of reverb, room etc, are very difficult to adjust, and I have to repeatedly tap super studio, and these features just don't open up. What happened to the good old app..!! Why give us the updates which don't work? All the fun is lost now. My friends who use the app have similar issues. Kindly look into the matter and set it right please.

I used to use this app a lot when I was a teenager just to entertain myself and it used to be all free and you did not need to buy a VIP subscription just to perform a solo song. This app has become absolutely atrocious and unusable. There is another app like this that I personally believe is much better, free, and doesn't have intrusive ads. They might not have the group option, but at least I don't pay $20 a month to be able to sing a solo. Obvious cash grab update

It's unfortunate that you can't pick your voice effect when joining others, can't change visual effects, and it just sounds off now. Whenever you record if you click out of the voice effect to adjust volume of your voice you CAN NOT go back to the effects. It needs fixed. Used to use it a while ago and recently got back on. Glad I only subscribed to one month VIP instead of committing to a full year again. I will say I like the globe and seeing where the other person is joining from.

I will change my rating if they fix the issues with the app. The recent update messed everything up for me, not sure if its because I have a Samsung. Anyways, I can't make videos anymore because the audio and video don't match like others have said. I also dont like the new options and singing styles. They made everything too complicated. Its not fun anymore which makes me sad. I used to love this app, but the new version is terrible. Please fix it!

title: Two Dots
description:
Join two brave dots as they traverse the arctic tundra, navigate fiery jungles, and plunge the ocean depths in the #1 hit game in over 100 countries. 

-------------------------------

‚Ä¢ FREE to play for life
‚Ä¢ CONNECT one dot to another, sink anchors, make a line, create bombs, fight fire, and much more in this fun free puzzle game
‚Ä¢ ADVENTURE through 2875 fun and addicting levels
‚Ä¢ ADORABLE fun, and thoughtful game design in this beautiful game about connecting
‚Ä¢ ENJOY beautiful minimalistic flat design with relaxing game music and fun sound fx
‚Ä¢ PLAY at your own pace to figure out the perfect move without having to worry about the old time clock
‚Ä¢ CHALLENGE your friends to a Two Dots match on Facebook, beat their scores, and earn medals
‚Ä¢ MAKE a line or a square, not a circle, to connect every dot of a single color

-------------------------------

comments: My favorite game, I literally deleted my other games because this is the only one I play now, I love it so much. Everything from how positive it is, to the perfectly fitting audio that plays. I love how simple and easy going this game is and I love how this games helps you succeed. The levels where you can locate items are super fun as well, recommending this game to everyone I know literally!!

Caution. This game is really nicely crafted, very visually rich, and enjoyable to play from levels 1-10. After this, things start to go absolutely mental. There is pop-up after pop-up, harassing you about another new feature. You quickly get to a point where you're bamboozled - everything on the screen is shouting at you. This appears to be by design, hyper confusion and attention hijacking to nurture addiction. This app is nefarious and should be enjoyed only with huge restraint.

Never log into Facebook. It causes you to lose the prizes from any contest you won. I had tons of things coming from a dots race and they vanished the second it connected to Facebook. Also, the game freezes and crashes a lot when watching videos to get a bonus box. You have to be patient when you open the app. It can take over five minutes to come up.

Honestly was obsessed with this game for awhile, but they made a bunch of updates and now every time you view the map about four or five different windows pop up to tell you about the different games. It used to just be the daily bonus. Tired of exiting out of a bunch of stupid notifications just to be able to click on the game I want. They ruined a good thing.

You get to a certain point and you can't win anything without spending money. With prices on everything else in life steadily increasing the last thing I wanna spend money on is a silly phone game. If you could just spend money once or twice, maybe no big deal. But you have to constantly spend money to get perks to help you thru the levels and clearly this is by design. It's a really cool game, and very disappointing to have to delete, but I'm just not up for money hungry games like this.

title: XMind: Mind Mapping
description:
Focusing solely on mind mapping for 12 years, XMind represents our understanding of mind mapping tool.
With its minimal design, smooth experience and powerful features, XMind is a powerful and easy to use mind mapping and brainstorming tool across all devices. 

#Beautiful and easy to use XMind mind mapping tool
- Desktop-class mind mapping graphics engine (Snowbrush): ensure a fast and powerful mind mapping experience as in the desktop;
- 16 mind map diagrams: including basic mind map structure, Fishbone, Org-Chart etc.;
- 10 eye-catching themes: all themes are redesigned, which enables your mind map a new look and feel;
- Files: faster find and manage mind maps on current devices;
- Follow the guidelines defined in the material design specification 
- Sharing: support exporting to .xmind or image file.Embed in Google Slides,Microsoft PowerPoint,Keynote.


---------

#Mind mapping anywhere
XMind, designed for people who work and study hard.
White-collar workers, business people, Internet practitioners, etc. use XMind as a necessary efficient tool for brainstorming, organizing ideas and work plans in every day life. 
Students and teachers use XMind to organize notes, prepare lessons, make a plan for the new term and remember words. 

------

>Meeting Notes
Record meeting content and ideas in a mind map as a clear and beautiful chart, put it in your PPT and show it to your colleagues

>Lecture Notes
Organize your lecture notes in a systematic way in a mind map, say goodbye to all the clutter and disorganization

>Inspiration collection
Easily record the inspiration and idea anywhere and anytime and form your own knowledge base. Brainstorm productively with friends.

>Travel Plans
Create daily plan before traveling. Record travel details during your journey.

>Resume
Introduce yourself with the Matrix or Timeline diagram more clearly and gain confidence.

>Annual Plan
All your daily plans, weekly and monthly plans or even annual plans can be presented clearly in a mind map.

------

Let us know if you have any feedback, or if we can help in any way at xmind-android-support@xmind.net.

comments: Privacy policy implies all usage may be collected, stored as personally identifiable and shared for any legitimate business use. Opt-out is only for sending crash data. Some features require signing up and paying a subscription, a detail missing from the app store description. The app takes a little getting used but works very well out of the box without signing in.

I would gave this app a 5 star..butttt i lost all my data due to losing my phone.so that i lost everything i worked for , for about 3 months!!!!! Yeah , just like that...i summerized over 20 books for my exam and everything went to thin air due to this app does not have a back up!!!! Then why are you thaking our emails to sign up?!!!!
I highly recommend this app as a personal assistant type thing that helps to manage your thoughts and goals; my only concern is privacy. It is the best I've used so far.
Its a good app. Works smooth and is very handy. Choose suitable templates and work is half done.
Such an amazing app. U can use it offline which is what I needed. Many themes and colors to chose from. Must give it a try!

title: Pandora - Streaming Music, Radio & Podcasts
description:
Listen to songs hand-picked by some of the top athletes in the world on UNINTERRUPTED Radio. Their music, their vibes, their channel.

Pandora gives you a personalized listening experience that continually evolves with your tastes. 

Create stations from your favorite songs, artists or genres, search or browse to find recommended stations for your mood or activity, and discover podcasts that speak to you. Download today and get instant access to your favorite artists and podcasts, while staying up to date on the most recent singles and releases. From rap and pop to rock and country, play your favorite artists and stay up to date on today‚Äôs top hits and releases. Start streaming all of the current global hits and enjoy your own personalized music experience. 

Take Pandora with you wherever you go with Android Auto for your daily commute or your next road trip. Enjoy your own personalized music or podcast experience from anywhere on the world‚Äôs most powerful music discovery platform. The new voice mode lets you search, play, pause, skip adjust volume & thumb up music with a simple voice command. Start streaming your favorite artist, song, genre, or podcast instantly today for free in your car.

With Podcasts on Pandora, find your favorites and listen to personalized recommendations that actually make sense. Just search on your mobile phone or tablet and play to start listening, then tap + to add to your collection. Find something new by simply browse and tap recommended podcasts to find over 1,400 podcasts, including SiriusXM shows, on-demand whether you're on Pandora Premium, Plus or Radio.

Looking for more?

Meet Pandora Modes - The new way to customize your station experience. Choose from six different modes to switch up the kind of music you're hearing:
‚Ä¢My Station: The station experience you know and love.
‚Ä¢Crowd Faves: Hear the most üëçsongs by other listeners.
‚Ä¢Deep Cuts: Hear less familiar songs from station artists.
‚Ä¢Discovery: Hear more artists who don't usually play on this station.
‚Ä¢Newly Released: Hear the newest releases from station artists.
‚Ä¢Artist Only: Hear songs from the station artist.

Pandora Premium‚Ñ¢
Subscribe to enjoy personalized on-demand music and podcasts

‚Ä¢ Search and play your favorite songs, podcasts, albums and playlists on-demand
‚Ä¢ Create playlists, not worklists ‚Äì on your own or powered by Pandora
‚Ä¢ Download the music you want for offline listening
‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips and replays
‚Ä¢ Higher quality audio
‚Ä¢ Listen with ad-free music

Pandora Plus‚Ñ¢
Subscribe to enjoy personalized radio with ad-free music

‚Ä¢ Unlimited personalized stations and podcasts
‚Ä¢ Up to four stations for offline listening
‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips and replays
‚Ä¢ Higher quality audio
‚Ä¢ Listen with ad-free music

Pandora Plus subscriptions are $4.99 per month. Pandora Premium subscriptions are $9.99 per month. You‚Äôll be charged as a recurring transaction through your Google Play account. Pending trial eligibility, charges for Plus >($4.99/month) or Premium ($9.99/month) begin at the end of a free trial unless you cancel 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription month. Any unused portion of a free Pandora Plus trial period will be forfeited if you upgrade to Pandora Premium. You can manage your subscription, cancel or turn off auto-renewal through Account Settings in your Google Play account. Pandora is available to US customers only.

Some advertising exclusions apply. Skips, replays and offline features may be limited by certain licensing restrictions. Pandora may use large amounts of data, and carrier data charges may apply. For best results, we recommend you connect your device to trusted Wi-Fi networks when available.

Terms and conditions:

‚Ä¢ Dark Mode is now available to users with Android 10 or greater and Samsung users with devices supporting Night Mode! Switch to Dark Mode to lower the brightness of your interface so you can focus on your music, not the screen.

comments: Ive been using Pandora for three years, and lately I've been having issues. Whenever I choose a specific song on my playlist it doesnt play it and ends up playing a different song on my playlist. I updated it and everything, and it still hasnt been fixed. I have no idea if it is a bug, but it needs to be fixed asap.

I've had continuous problems with pandora since I got it. I download songs and playlists, then when I try to play them, it says I haven't downloaded them. It never wants to open unless it has an internet connection, even though all I ever listen to is my playlists in offline mode unless I am actively searching for new music. And now today, with no warning or reason WHATSOEVER, it has erased ALL my music and playlists!!!!! My advice is don't waste your money.

I use it just about every day. The app will automatically close if I pause a song for 1 min to do something on my phone. The app will close and I have to restart it and the playlist. super annoying. I've un-installed and re-installed it, and that helped the crashes that everyone, including myself, used to have. It didn't help the pause and automatically closing issues...I've checked my phone settings on my old Samsung10 5g and they're cool...it is the app that is the issue.

I've been a Pandora subscriber for several years now. I love no ads. Since Last update, Pandora just stops working and closes. I thought it was my phone. Then I changed phones, for other reasons. Still plays for about 15 minutes before having to reopen the app. I hope that bug can be fixed. I have to see all that work fine tuning my stations be all for naught.

Used to work great but now it will shuffle through all songs without playing them , the songs will pop up then the next one will pop up while no music is heard or can be played. I've uninstalled multiple times and can't figure out the issue. I want my refund back because I can't use the app or listen to the song I want

Play all format video, including MKV, MP4, M4V, AVI, MOV, 3GP, FLV, WMV, RMVB, TS etc.

HD Video Player
Play HD, full HD & 4k video smoothly, moreover play video in slow motion.

XPlayer video player all format is a totally FREE HD video player for android, simple and powerful. Any video formats are supported. All-in-one media player for different formats. We are open to any suggestions for better user experience. Please feel free to contact us at xplayer.feedback@gmail.com
summary:
Support ALL video formats,
4K & HD, subtitle, Chromecast, Background Play, etc.
developerAddress: 27 Maywood Road,  Delmar, NY, United States of America
recentChanges: * Fix bug that can‚Äôt download subtitle.
comments: I love this video player compared to the default one on phones. Runs well, and the play opinions are great. Live Stream doesn't work well, but luckily I don't really use that. EDIT- After a while of using this player, I just bought Premium because I love this app that much. And I mean you don't really need premium to use this app, so people, please try this app. It'll be worth it.

Please add "opaque box" for subtitle. Add the "select subtitle" next to the night mode on the screen. double tap skip is very useful. create "second to seek for jump action", "10 second" for skip is very limited. Change the brightness and volume numbers of 1-10 to 1-100. Add the video name to display in playback section. Thanks.
I have issue with SW decoder, it's annoying because I can't watch movies as good as possible. This problem started like 7 days ago, please fix it.
I'm premium member (paid) Last few version, the "remember brightness" doesn't work. I reported few times to the developer, and I didn't get any response. Beware, No after service.

I'm actually in love with this app but now I'm just giving 1 star to grab the developers immediate attention, recently on Android 10 or 11, Google introduced an option to slide the music playback duration from the notification shade. And I badly I'm need of that feature on this app ASAP. Unless, I'm not giving u my 5star rating again. Please try to understand, otherwise I'll have to download another application just for this feature. Please add this feature ASAP.

title: FitCoach: Personalized Fitness
description:
WORKOUTS TO LOSE WEIGHT
‚ñ∫ Smart training plans
‚ñ∫ Visible results
‚ñ∫ Guided exercises

FitCoach is a brand-new fitness app for those who want to start a new active lifestyle, build healthy habits, lose weight, get fit, tone up and feel amazing.

WHO IS THIS APP FOR?

The FitCoach app is developed specifically for people who care about their health and want to slim down and get in shape but don‚Äôt have enough time to go to the gym.

HOW TO START WITH FITCOACH?
Set your goals: weight loss, muscle gain, or to be more active
Select the zone that you want to work on: belly, buttocks, legs, arms, back
Enter your personal data such as age, height, weight, fitness level, etc.

HOW DOES IT WORK:
According to your goals and personal data, our smart algorithm will suggest a personalized workout plan ‚Äì a combination of cardio, strength, recovery, and LISS (walking, running, cycling) exercises that will enable you to maximize your results. 
The basic plan will be created for 60 days and displayed in your calendar. Each week the workout plan will be updated according to your progress and feedback (were the previous workouts too easy or too difficult for you).
Additionally, you will have access to a library of 1,000+ workouts.

HEALTHKIT:
FitCoach integrates with HealthKit, so you can export nutrition and exercise data from FitCoach to HealthKit, and import fitness data and weight and body measurements from HealthKit to FitCoach.


Frequently Asked Questions: https://myfitcoach.fitness/faq-android.html

comments: Useless to install. There are not include at least 1 week trail period. It should pay before you start and before that they collect all detail about you. So if you check this app, after install and go to app settings and give no internet acceas and then try the app. But you have to pay before using it.

Shouldve given an option for a 3 or 7 day trial. I subscribe and accidently chosen the 1 year plan which cost sgd44. 90 and i cant get a refund. If theres a trial. People should be charged oncd the trial end. People also should be able to see how this app works. Really disappointed. App sucks and no refund, at least give back half of the payment. Its sgd44. 90. And im not going to use the app. üëéüèº
Downloaded it, and what rubbish. The workout is a joke. I paid 11euro and won't be using it at all. subscription cancelled automatically.

I love it. The only thing I wish got updated/ fixed is that when I do extra workouts, I wish it would count/record it & that It doesnt record the work outs I do after 12am. Sometimes i only have time to work 11p-1a. But besides that I feel motivated,& since its split in 7min-12mins, I dont feel like it takes up my day or that Im really doing much. I feel like I have so much more energy. I highly recommend fit coach, especially if you are starting to get in shape(that's where I am at)

This app is terrible. I made the mistake of buying into this before checking it out and I cant get a refund. There is no support for the exercises and the menu options have no proteins at all so unless you are a vegetarian this is terrible. I had my data exported to me and it all says "none" even though I entered all my info. Do not waste your time or money on this garbage. Im out $30 and learned a valuable lessen to learn more before investing. This app doesn't even deserve 1 star!!!

title: SMbox Neuro
description:
SMbox is a 3Clicks application for Healthcare Professionals. SMbox offers quick and intuitive access to
essential medical information on diagnostics and treatment of sclerosis multiplex.
In SMbox you will find:
ÔÇ∑ Essential information on the diagnosis and treatment of sclerosis multiplex (SM)
ÔÇ∑ Diagnostic and treatment scales, calculators and algorithms
ÔÇ∑ Drug Reimbursement Programs
ÔÇ∑ Reference Centers for Drug Reimbursement Programs
ÔÇ∑ Information about upcoming conferences and congresses
ÔÇ∑ Patient educational materials

All materials within SMbox come from well-documented sources of medical knowledge and are updated
on a regular basis, providing HCP with reliable and practical support in the therapeutic decision process.
3Clicks platform allows for development of innovative, mobile app, addressed to Health Care
Professionals, which combines essential medical knowledge on diagnosis and treatment of specific 
medical conditions in an easy and practical format containing diagnostic scales, treatment algorithms,
and multimedia files.

title: Scrabble¬Æ GO - New Word Game
description:
Welcome to Scrabble GO, the free new and updated version of the classic word game!
‚≠êYour winning word awaits!‚≠ê
 
Classic Scrabble Game with New Word Game Features
Official Scrabble board ‚û§ Custom word tiles ‚û§ Scrabble dictionary ‚û§ Authentic crossword game experience
 
Play with Friends and Family
Easily find new Scrabble friends ‚û§ Challenge your friends ‚û§ Use our fun and easy-to-use chat emojis & phrases to chat with friends & family  
 
New Word Games - Move beyond the traditional scrabble board with 4 fast-paced competitive game modes!
1.       Duels - Fast-Paced, head-to-head Scrabble game! Play 5 turns against players of similar skill. Watch out for the timer and unlock Scrabble prize chests.
2.       Word Drop - New word search game. Used word tiles are replaced with new custom tiles, opening new crossword game possibilities!
3.       Tumbler - Like anagrams? Find as many high-scoring words from a rotating set of letters in a limited amount of time.
4.       Rush - Challenge yourself in this Solo Scrabble mode, set up high-scoring plays on a smaller 11x11 scrabble board.
‚≠êPlay the updated version of the classic word game as a free to play mobile game‚≠ê
 
Collect Playable Word Tiles
Play Scrabble GO and personalize the classic scrabble experience with custom word tiles! Unlock chests to discover and collect a variety of new tiles! New and limited-edition tiles are added often, so be sure to collect them all!
 
Scrabble Game Features
‚û§Scrabble Leagues - Play against other Scrabble friends to achieve top league rankings to get more XP and chests as well as an exclusive League Frame to show off your progress.
‚û§Practice Mode - Play Scrabble 1-on-1 against the computer. Designed to match your skill level, it‚Äôs a great way to test out new strategies and tactics.
‚û§Boosts - Powerful word game boosts like Hint, Upgrade, Word Spy, and Vortex help take your gameplay to the next level.
‚û§Track Stats - View your scoring averages, longest words, best plays, and more!  See how your word puzzle Scrabble skills are progressing with our in-depth profile page or visit another player‚Äôs profile.
‚û§Level up & Unlock more - Unlock new collectible Scrabble tiles and other features by scoring points in Scrabble games and Duels, or by ranking high on the Arena leaderboards!
 
Privacy Policy:
http://scopely.com/privacy/
Terms of Service:
http://scopely.com/tos/
 
Like Scrabble GO on Facebook!  https://www.facebook.com/ScrabbleGO/ 
By installing this game, you agree to the terms of the license agreements.

recentChanges:
Scrabble lovers get ready for the most exciting Scrabble tiles yet!
- NEW FEATURE - Tile Masters!
--- Take your Scrabble tiles to the next level with new evolving tiles
--- Earn new limited-time currency through the game to cash in our your new tile
- Fun new events rewarding tiles, currency, and much more that you won't want to miss out on

comments: I have a love/hate relationship with this game. I love the various types of games. There's so much to play and the puzzles beyond scrabble are fun. I hate the implementation of ads. There's so many! I could cope if they all had the same format, but these fullscreen ads all have the 'X' in different places. I find the interface too cluttered, bright and confusing. There's too much going on and it makes it difficult to navigate. The animations for rewards are too long and frequent. Get rid!

The game itself is fine. Works well etc. However, it seems to be a meet up place for middle aged to senior men. They all start out polite, how are you etc but within a few exchanges, they want you to go on WhatsApp or hangouts. Some of us would just like to play Scrabble! I seriously have turned down, at least, 15 to 20 men. It's not a dating app.

This game is vile and takes away from the true spirit of scrabble. Players cheat by using hints which they are pathetic enough to pay for. You cant progress in the mini games without paying. The graphics are an eyesore, the adverts are constant (unless youre willing to pay of course). The 'Bots' who im guessing dont have an agenda, as they aren't real people can take ages to take their turn. This game is a disgrace and does not encourage people to use their own minds, to learn or play for free.

This game is a fun way to pass the time, but it can be frustrating at times. I tap on the "swap tiles" icon because I had about 4 letters that were the same. I look at an ad (I don't want to see) so that I can swap out my tiles, and they literally give me back the same exact tiles I had before. This is the 3rd time this has happened. Also, they don't allow us to use all the words in the dictionary. I know we cant use proper nouns, but there are other words we should be able to use.

I love playing Scrabble. It's a lot of fun. The reviews are right there are tons of ads. Most of them are 5 seconds. And you can choose longer ones to get more rewards sometimes. There's a chat feature that can be fun when talking to friends. Or maybe people who you played a lot of games with already. But there are a lot of people that are scammers that are trying to chat. And when you realize that and try to end a game with them it wrecks your winning streak.

title: Brain It On! - Physics Puzzles
description:
Deceptively challenging physics puzzles for your brain!

Draw shapes to solve challenging physics puzzles. They're not as easy as they look. Care to give one a try?

‚óÜ Dozens of brain busting physics puzzles, with more being added all the time
‚óÜ Compete with your friends for the Brain It On! crown
‚óÜ Multiple ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution?
‚óÜ Share your unique solutions and compare with your friends

All the levels can be unlocked for free by earning stars in previous levels. You can always find dozens of new player created free levels each day on the community screen. You can also purchase the game to remove all ads, unlock all hints, unlock levels early, and unlock the level editor.

Please note: purchasing the "No Popup Ads" option just removes the ads between levels, purchasing the "Full Game" will also remove the ads to get hints.

If you like this game, please rate it and leave a comment. As an indie developer your support is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your help! If you don't like something in the game, please email me at support@brainitongame.com and tell me why. I want to hear your feedback and comments so I can continue to make this game better.

You can find me on Twitter at @orbitalnine, see the latest news on the Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/brainitongame, or get all the details on the website: http://brainitongame.com

I hope you enjoy Brain It On!

recentChanges:
- Added a very hard difficulty levels tab on the community levels screen
- Added black borders to the hint shapes to help see overlapping shapes

comments: You will probably give up on some levels because you have no clue. Might even watch a hint still be unsure. Always room for improvement! It's rewarding when you figure it out. The physics overall work well, I had a few issues where the peices glitch through eachother. But it's rare and just requires a restart. No big deal. The levels start off easy, now I'm skipping some levels because I can't figure it out. If you want a challenge. Try this game. It's a lot of fun.

I love this game. Starting off drawing shapes to move balls around the screen, the game developes, becoming a balancing act of inginuity, precision and skill, without adding any additional mechanics. The level design is tight, teaching ideas organically, without becoming impossible, but hArd COrE GaMerS can enjoy trying over and over for full stars. The ads aren't infuriating, and although the objects can clip, it's rare enough to be funny, instead of infuriating.

"Gravity, to Copernicus, is the nostalgia of things to become spheres." - Annie Dillard ....... Sometimes an itch comes along that you just have to scratch. Impressed so far - still rather early in my experience of the game - but thinking a stylus would be quite helpful. Thanks to the developers.

It used to be an rxcellent brain trainer that fotces you to think outside the box. Now it's broken because it wants to force use of "Google Play Games" library to "enhance experience" with useless tie-in with farcebook and other useless social stuff. Uninstall as broken. I corrected, it wasn't "some games library" it's "Google Play Games". It forces me to the Google Play app to install it. I can provide screenshot.

I love it! It does not rush you, if you get it wrong you haven't wasted hours, only seconds.At the moment I feel educated, and with a greater appreciation for physical objects. On Premium you can delete it when you get angry, then reinstall months later unchanged, no penalty. You need a precision stylus if you use it on mobile phone (I must get one!) . The 'hints' and 'restart' buttons are badly placed for right handers, you can accidentally press them during play, I wish I could move them.

title: Bloodwatch HCP
description: The Bloodwatch Healthcare Professional App is a comprehensive patient management system to support the treatment of patients with Multiple Sclerosis. The Bloodwatch app is designed to optimise safety monitoring by allowing the Healthcare team to review unacknowledged alerts, pathology results and patients with overdue labs while away from their clinics.

title: Design Home: Play + Save
description:
Looking for a new creative hobby? Play Design Home today - a relaxing, fun game that allows you to live the life of an interior decorator. Sharpen your decorating skills in daily Design Challenges and style visually stunning three-dimensional spaces with access to real, high-end furniture and decor brands. Unlock 'My Homes' to access bathrooms, kitchens and more customization options to bring your dream homes to life! It‚Äôs quick, it‚Äôs fun and you can connect with a vibrant creative community while learning about diverse d√©cor styles - thus improving your design skills and gaining inspiration that you can even apply in your real life.

* Relax through play and express your creativity in daily Design Challenges.
* Unlock rewards as you polish your amazing abilities as an interior decorator.
* Level up to access 'My Homes' - with dream homes of your very own to design as you wish!
* Play with real life, high-end brands as you learn about different interior design styles.
* Vote on your favorite rooms from a vibrant, creative community.
* Share your creativity and borrow furnishings from your friends when you connect to Facebook.

With new pieces added every day, Design Home lets you play with home furnishings from real-life brands - all available directly at your fingertips. Not only can you discover brands and trends, you can get inspired and build your interior decorating skills! 

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
- This game is not intended for children.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game‚Äôs ‚ÄúHelp‚Äù feature.

Terms of Service: http://www.glu.com/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.glu.com/privacy

comments: I really love this game, it is addictive. I recommend a few changes or I need to back away from playing. To decorate the way you'd like, it cost too much money. I think once you've earned an item it should be yours to keep. You only get to use it 5 times then you have to keep re-purchasing. Also, the "My Homes" doesn't keep up with your pace, you can only collect 50 keys then you just lose them. I wish when going through items to purchase you could sort by price. 5 stars down to 3, sorry!

I absolutely like this game. The designs and inventory are pretty. I like the fact that they give you diamonds every day and have a chance to earn money on a design with out having to spend any money. This comment was when I first started playing the game. I have been p!aying for a few months now and I sense the frustration as others do about the voting process. It really needs to be rethought. It is not fair and gives stars when not due and no stars when due. People see differently!

Love this app, but I would love some real review so I can learn how to.get the 5.0 scores all the time. Also, the app expects you to buy too much all the time with what is required. It makes it hard to just play in the app. We need more daily challenges. Update: I really like this app but it is so hard to do more than 1 challenge because everything costs so much in diamonds. Too expensive.

Design home is my daily stress reliever. Although I love this game, I have to say that it is always taking forever to load and it is not my connection though it says I have a bad connection. For the few years I have been playing it I haven't complained but I'm at level 51 and just trying to load an option takes forever and sometimes I'm told item can't be found right nowü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. It's a little frustrating but still absolutely love this game. Please let me know if there is a way to improve this?

Game is great.. expensive if you want to keep up...but it never ever connects for me the 1st time . and it's not my interent it's your server...One time I have to use my interent then I have to use my data..and most times I have to go back and forth 3 or 4 times to see which it will take...and this is every single day a few times a day .it never is the same and takes forever to load when it finally gets working.. but I do love the game! I am addicted just wish you would fix those 2 things...

title: AAC Autism myVoiceCommunicator
description:
With AAC Autism app, turn your android device into an augmentative and alternative communication (AAC) device. AAC Autism is designed to aide non-verbal children and adults with communication. 

Unlike many other AAC communication apps of this type, AAC Autism myVoice app can be used IMMEDIATELY after install for communication of basic needs, wants and/or emotions. This app has been preloaded with pictures to touch, (AAC Autism myVoice app will immediately speak or say what's tapped or touched) from meals and drinks (pancakes, lasagna, bananas, milk, apple juice) to different places (home, park) and toys or emotions (for ex. "I am happy!"). Simple and easy to use categories based on pictures. Also, includes a "manual" tool for people who can spell and just want the app to speak what they typed. This AAC app is for anyone that is nonverbal.

No subscriptions or extras to purchase later. It's all included in this app! Add your own images to the AAC Autism myVoice app anytime for free. AAC Autism myVoice has an easy to use upload tool. Great for including pictures of family and favorite things! Also, from the Active screen, caregivers can activate/deactivate any current or uploaded images at any time.

***Key Features***
* Ready to use AAC device immediately with preloaded images to touch and speak now
* Very simple and easy for children (even toddlers) to use
* Use your own pictures of things your child is familiar with
* Easy to activate/deactivate preloaded or uploaded images

App is developed with the emphasis for:

‚Ä¢ Autism spectrum disorders (ASD)
‚Ä¢ Multiple sclerosis
‚Ä¢ Down syndrome
‚Ä¢ Cerebral palsy
‚Ä¢ Dyspraxia
‚Ä¢ Stroke
‚Ä¢ Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
‚Ä¢ Asperger syndrome
‚Ä¢ Motor neuron disease (MND)
‚Ä¢ Speech impediments
‚Ä¢ Aphasia
‚Ä¢ Rett syndrome
‚Ä¢ Apraxia

recentChanges: New links for updating
comments: Using custom pictures is basically impossible. My daughter doesn't need all the pics you have by default. I want my own pictures. But I can not. It doesn't allow me. I hit the add picture button. I select the picture. I write the text and hit the finish button. But it doesn't update. If keeps the same stock pictures. And removing those stock pictures. It's like you wanted us to struggle so much that we finally give up.
Won't upload pictures from my samsung. This was the main feature I was looking for. Now I'm disappointed because the app is (for me ) useless and a waste of money.
I am trying to use the app and teach my son how to use it. It constantly freezes and boots us out. Won't upload pics meaningful to him. Using Samsung as suggested.

A good app but needs more things adding like alphabet with big keys so i can type short sentences as well with having Moto neurone disease it's impossible to use goggle key board with my hands far to small hope there will be updates to come could be a great app with more added
Problem SOLVED! Thanks to help from the app folks we are up & Running. So excited to use this app.

comments: 0 STARS This app NEVER worked properly with my Galaxy S10 and now I have a Note 20 Ultra and it STILL DOES NOT WORK!!! When I try and go to "My Page" I keep getting "SERVER ERROR (0) TRY AGAIN LATER" I HAVE "TRIED AGAIN LATER" FOR OVER A YEAR! FIX YOU APP! Still no resolution over 4 months: Displays my galaxy s20plus warenty is rejected after review using this app. I called Samsung multiple times to have this corrected and they still don't have any idea how to fix this. They say my warenty should not be rejected. This is very disturbing my warenty status still showing its rejected since the beginning of July and no one at samsung knows what to do to fix the samsung members app?? This shouldn't be so difficult to correct.

Why doesn't this app help with finding my phone via chat as my phone can't be reached? I was told to stay online as he was rerouting me to someone that can help, that was 30 minutes ago so I copied it all as no way to get a transcript.
Hardware test may be useful, but I would trust 3rd party software more. otherwise I find this app mostly useless. I said it in 2017 and I'm saying now in 2020.

Many thanks to Samsung for creating such a beautiful app. The Galaxy Store is even more beautiful than the Play Store. But the Galaxy Store needs more big updates. So that everything can be found beautifully in one search.

comments: App is decent for online meetings. I use it for group meetings as well as one on one collaboration. It is as good as zoom and some of the other platforms out there. I like that you can set the meeting to be open to anyone that has the link. unlike zoom the host doesn't have to add each individual to the meeting and you can also lock the meeting so no one else can get in if it's a private conversation, for instance an appointment with a therapist.

I was a first time user & was originally overwhelmed by all of the different options & directions. Also, I was attempting to use a "smart" phone which gave me limited screen usage. I would suggest that there be a test setup & a dummy call for novices; that way we can get practice before our actual conference call. We could also work out any kinks with our equipmemt. UPDATE: 6/17/20 I've used the system frequently over the past month. The system is a good option for those w/limited screen size.

I use this app for group virtual meetings at my government occupation. the app works wonderful, lots of video, audio, quality settings to chose from. my only issue would be that I had a great deal of difficulty initially learning how to join an active group. in fact I missed the first two meetings because I couldn't get it to work, and I am very technically proficient, from building barebones CPUs, html Java cyber security ect, and I still found the login to join meeting process very difficult.

As the parent of student, I've had to learn this app to support my child's education & I have to say, it's pretty decent. It could be a little less glitchy on audio. The video streamed rather smoothly. It wasn't exactly HDMI quality but it wasn't Commadore 64 pixelated either. There was a time delay of a few seconds with audio, that wasn't reflected in the video stream at all, when transitioning but it seemed as tho it would handle a few users at a time when speaking. Overall, very sufficient!

I have used Webex several times and have always been happy with the quality of voice and video. This time specially, there were some delays (5-10 seconds) on what presenter was sharing on his screen with attendees. He could see a new page, but we were still waiting to get it in our screen.

title: Microsoft Outlook: Organize Your Email & Calendar
description:
Easily organize with email, calendar, and files in one app with Microsoft Outlook. With intelligent email, calendar reminders and contacts, Outlook for Android lets you do more from one powerful inbox. Connect. Organize. Get things done.

Email friends, family and colleagues from multiple accounts on one app and see what matters most first with the Focused Inbox that keeps the important messages on top. Switch between your emails and calendar to schedule your next meeting or share your availability with anyone with just a few taps. Email a document from your Files list or a photo from your Gallery and attach it easily.

Microsoft Outlook provides seamless inbox management that enables you to stay connected on the go. Outlook includes Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneDrive integrations to help you manage and send files and connects with Teams, Zoom and other video calling providers without hassle.

Customize email and calendars so you can stay on top of your busy day. Listen to what‚Äôs new in your inbox, organize  schedules and more. Find what you need with Search- it‚Äôs only a tap away or you can use your voice and ask for what you need with language you use every day.

Outlook for Android works with Microsoft Exchange, Microsoft 365, Outlook.com, Gmail and Yahoo Mail.

 MICROSOFT OUTLOOK FEATURES:

 One Place ‚Äì Email, Calendar, Contacts & Files
‚Ä¢ Email, calendar, contacts and files are all together in one place.
‚Ä¢ Calendar and file access right from your inbox.
‚Ä¢ Connected experiences with Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneNote.
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Office documents are accessible from Outlook, stored locally, or on OneDrive or other cloud storage.
‚Ä¢ Create and join your online video calls and meetings with Teams, Zoom, BlueJeans and Webex.

Organized ‚Äì Email & Day Planner Management
‚Ä¢ Outlook helps you stay on top of your day with customized calendar and email capabilities.
‚Ä¢ Know what‚Äôs Up Next in your day from your calendar with a glance at your inbox.
‚Ä¢ Email inbox management displays your most important messages first and enables swipe gestures and smart filters.
‚Ä¢ Use as an organizer & share calendars to easily coordinate schedules.
‚Ä¢ RSVP to invitations from your inbox and send a personalized comment too.
‚Ä¢ Add schedules from Facebook or of your favorite sports & TV shows through Bing calendars.

Intelligent ‚Äì Calendar & Inbox Organizer
‚Ä¢ Outlook provides helpful ways for you to stay focused.
‚Ä¢ Use your voice to find people, contacts, emails, events and attachments with Search.
‚Ä¢ Use suggested replies instead of typing out your message responses to get things done faster.
‚Ä¢ Email manager highlights actions for you through @mentions.
‚Ä¢ Calendar automatically updates with travel and delivery information.
‚Ä¢ Focused Inbox keeps important emails and conversations front and center.
‚Ä¢ Email organizer groups same subject emails and conversations for easier tracking.
‚Ä¢ Listen to your emails with Play My Emails in English and catch up hands-free to get time back in your day.

Secure ‚Äì Safe Email Management & Spam Protection
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Outlook protects your information with security you can trust.
‚Ä¢ Simple, secure sign-on to authenticate and protect your identity.
‚Ä¢ Email management with built-in protection against viruses and spam.
‚Ä¢ Advanced protection to keep your messages safe from phishing attacks and other online threats.
‚Ä¢ Microsoft security and privacy keeps your email, calendar, contacts and files safe.

Get management for contacts, email, work schedule, files and more with Microsoft Outlook today.

recentChanges: Sick of that company-wide email that everyone is still replying all to? So are we. Stay focused on what's important by getting it and all future replies out of your inbox and straight into deleted items with our new Ignore Conversation feature.
comments: Love Outlook! Always have! I've used other formats & platforms over the years, when working at someone else's house or office, or using equipment not my own, but nothing has ever come close to matching the complete package that is Outlook. It's extremely user friendly & even the tech-challenged can usually sort their way through pretty much any function, with relative ease. I have always used Outlook & at 55 years old, don't imagine I'll be changing anytime soon.

I use this for work. There is often an extremely long delay between getting a notification for an email and actually being able to view it. The email will be instantly available in Outlook online, but can take up to 5 minutes to load in mobile. The app sends notifications for meetings 15 minutes in advance, but clearing the notification in any way just results in the app resending the notification. Oh, it does the same thing with "meeting has ended" notifications. Atrocious app design.

On my old Samsung phone I had the outlook app and NEVER had problems with it. I have had a new phone for 2 weeks and this app has had endless problems. It freezes, it doesn't load emails, it won't send emails and every variation in between. I have followed online suggestions to clear the cache and data and yes the problem is solved for no more than 1 day. I have also uninstalled and reinstalled the app and again the problem is solved for a day and then back to having the same issues. Woeful!

Whilst I love the features of Ms Outlook, the app has pitfalls. I will receive a notification of a new email, click to review said email and it will be no where to be found. Refresh, refresh, nothing! However, if I go on the desktop web version I will see everything as it is to date. ... This app defeats the purpose of having a mobile service if I always have to draw for my laptop to review emails.

This version of Outlook (mobile, Android) seems appropriately scaled down to suit small screen and "keyboard" use and appears to have been optimised for email. Most (or maybe all?) of its original functionality is there, but some features might need a bit of hunting, until you learn how to find them. . Great to be able to use full strength email via phone, with that robust corporate look & feel that Outlook is known for.

comments: Wow! I am so impressed with this App! It's very easy to use. It shows you how to do the exercises and it even counts the seconds for you!!! It's definitely motivating! Thank you for such a great app!!! The only thing I can't work out is how to use it on my IPad or laptop. It connects with my google account and phone thats it..... Be great if someone could help me get it on one of those devices please! üôÇ

I LOVE this app. It's AMAZING! There are exervcises for every training. You can even do exercises in your bed and office. This is so convenient and it also tracks your exercise and reminds you to drink water. I absolutely reccomend this app. It also helps you loose weight and keep you fit. Definitely recommend downloading this! Keep up the great work! üëç

Fantastic app with great fitness features! Way better than an app I paid 20$ for 3 months for. Ladies, give this a try. I'm finding myself doing a bit more and more each day. It's fun, easy, and comprehensive, yet challenging when you're comfortable taking that next step and increasing your duration and intensity. Very user friendly: great pause/stop functions and additional direction when you need a move or pose explained in greater detail. I should of just went with this!

Best of all. I have came across several apps to give me a proper plan to stick on. Out of all this is the best. Honest opinion. I wondered how it got high ratings and I downloaded. Ended up giving high ratingüòÇ Pretty sure you will fall in love with this app. Ads aren't that disturbing and the UI is pretty descent. Be honest with the app and it will give u a very good result. Go on with it.

I thoroughly like this app, I do have one issue but it isnt enough to drop a star in my rating. I would like the option to enter in workouts I have done not on the app. I do 20 minutes of cardio every morning and would like to track that with the rest of my things on the app. I will add the water reminder is incredible to have. I hate water and will go days without 1 sip other than to brush teeth so this is a huge help. Over all I enjoy using the app.

title: Math Exercises for the brain, Math Riddles, Puzzle
description:
Increase your brain power and compete against players from around the world!
Experience the heated battle that will keep you on your toes!

Free Math Games for everyone from kids to adults. Brain games is based on principles of cognitive psychology to help you practice different mental skills: memory, attention, speed, reaction, concentration, logic, mathematics, time tables and more math quiz. 

Fight with other people in math game in multiplayer Arena in real time! 

"Quick Brain" - it is a Puzzle game with many levels and multiplayer:
- Multiplication table
- Training game with flexible settings for math (Multiply, Plus, Minus, Divide), time for questions, complexity and type of game like Test, True / false or Input of answer with keyboard.
-  2048 - puzzle with many sizes, 4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7, 8x8 and speed level
- True / False mathematics game
- Mathematics Balance
- Schulte table
- Multiplayer Arena with leaderboards. You can fight with your friends in real time!

For all ages: games for kids, for parents and for everybody!

The main advantages:
- quick developing of memory and attention for children and adults
- efficient training of the brain
- simple and understandable process of playing
- game is available without Internet connection
- app doesn‚Äôt spend much time
- number sense

The application will be useful for all ages:
- students and kids - to master the basics of mathematics and arithmetic, learn multiplication table, prepare for math tests and exams
- adults who want to keep their mind and brain in good shape

Develop your intellectual facilities by solving various mathematical tasks as quickly as possible: addition, subtraction, multiplication and division! Limited amount of time for answering only stimulates your brain to work faster, better and more efficiently.

Mountain your Math skills by playing ¬´Quick Brain¬ª daily! Compare your records with friends, thereby motivating yourself to be the best among them.

Brain Teasers do not require special knowledge so everyone can improve their brain function through repetition and adaptation. 

In Quick Brain your main target is to reach the highest number possible within the time limit, all while dealing with the high difficulty and all the other challenges that appear as you play.

comments: The best üëçüíØü•∞ü•∞üòçüòçüòçüòòüòòlot of support from me. Actually I thought of dwonloading other game but your game has make me intelligent üòã and it's interesting while I'm doing nothing but your game has a feeling that makes me happy because I answer and the game asked haha Btw the best is the multiplication stage ahh it's sad that now people doesn't have time to play like your game but other shooting games like PUBG but still this is the best game ever. If I said thanks then this is not enough and it will never be enough. By all means, this app is remarkable and so useful. Since my childhood I used to have problems with Math and till today actually I still but with this app I am developing myself a day by day and it really works. I have a suggestion for you to make this app perfect. Try to add more games that is suitable for all ages. Like what? The games are very challenging. They're really good for our brain. I'm enjoying the games specially that they're offline. Thank you very much for developing these games. They are very helpful to us who are getting older.

title: StarMaker: Sing free Karaoke, Record music videos

Bring out the singer in you with StarMaker‚Äî‚ÄîThe popular Karaoke App featured by Google Play and Apple StoreüèÜ

StarMaker is a popular singing app and music community with 50MÔºãusers globally, sing free karaoke songs and make friends through music now!

No matter you like Pop or Hip hop, R&B or folk, just pick your favorite songs from millions of songs, sing along with the high quality backing music and rolling lyrics, edit your recordings with a selection of voice effects and video filters, and share to social platforms like Whatsapp, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Snapchat and more.
