title: Yelp: Find Food, Delivery & Services Nearby
description:
Yelp has over 199 million business and restaurant reviews worldwide. Whether you‚Äôre looking for a new pizzeria, a great coffee shop nearby, a new salon, or the best handyman in town, Yelp is the city and travel guide to finding the perfect places to eat, shop, drink, relax, visit and play.

Read online reviews, browse photos and menus, order takeout from favorite spots, make reservations, see hours, locations, and other important information for any business you‚Äôre looking for. 

Yelp puts great local businesses right at your fingertips. Discover new foods, hot spots, places for shopping and local businesses near me! While traveling or at home. Plus, order delivery or pickup. 

Yelp features: 
üçï Local Eats: Find Restaurants and Food Delivery Near Me  üçï
‚Ä¢ Find where to eat. Yelp shows all the newest, hottest and top rated places to eat and bars to drink nearby 
‚Ä¢ Dine at local restaurants for breakfast, lunch and dinner, or get something to go
‚Ä¢ Order timely food delivery
‚Ä¢ Make quick reservations, book a table, order pickup or food delivery, view restaurant menus‚Äîall from your phone
‚Ä¢ Read restaurant reviews from other Yelp users and scroll through photos to help you decide where to go
‚Ä¢ Get amazing food deals for dining and delivery places nearby, plan dinner reservations for trips in advance

‚úçÔ∏è Review, Discover, and Add Photos üì∏
‚Ä¢ Discover local events, businesses and services like body shops and hair salons
‚Ä¢ Look up addresses and phone numbers for businesses near me
‚Ä¢ Read and write reviews, check-in to local businesses, upload photos and add tips for other Yelp users
‚Ä¢ Browse photo galleries and add photos to share experiences
‚Ä¢ Redeem great check-in offers in the area or sign up for cash back

üöó Find Shops Around Me, Get Quotes, and Hire Professionals üõ†
‚Ä¢ Find the coolest stores and top rated body shops complete with customer reviews and contact info 
‚Ä¢ Hire local professionals for home renovation, car repair, car transport, landscaping, moving, and other hiring services
‚Ä¢ Get quotes from professionals, message contractors nearby, and book appointments with a click
‚Ä¢ Read millions of user reviews and recommendations by the Yelp community
‚Ä¢ Filter searches by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, location, and hours of operation 

üíÖ Beauty - Pamper Yourself üíá
‚Ä¢ Find highly-rated salons, spas, massage therapists, acupuncturists, and offers around me 
‚Ä¢ Book appointments through Yelp at the most relaxing staycation destinations or find deals when traveling

üîç Search Filters üîç
‚Ä¢ Filter search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, open now, and other specifics like good for groups, full bar, cuisine type etc.
‚Ä¢ Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, order food delivery and make quick reservations directly from the Yelp app
‚Ä¢ Find the top rated food, hotels or hiring services nearby or in cities like New York, Chicago, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Houston, Phoenix, Philadelphia

üç© Features üé®
‚Ä¢ Read millions of expert user reviews and browse through beautiful photos of each business
‚Ä¢ Write and read online reviews, check-in to local businesses, order pickup or delivery, upload photos, book appointments, find a new activity, and add tips for other Yelp users
‚Ä¢ Use Yelp as a travel guide and as a food guide for eating, drink, things to do, to see, to shop and relax

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp-support.com/?l=en_US 
Note: Continued use of GPS running can dramatically decrease battery life. 

This software uses code of FFmpeg (http://ffmpeg.org) licensed under the LGPLv2.1 (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/lgpl-2.1.html) and its source can be downloaded here: https://github.com/Yelp/ffmpeg-android

Find top local restaurants, bars, hotels, events and other things to do around me, read customer reviews, order pickup or delivery, and search for services near me, all from the Yelp app.

comments: After the app updates on 10/29/20 a new review I posted indicated "save review as draft" when i chose "post review". Then it wouldn't allow me to update or post the draft. I exited and re-entered the app to find the review already posted. The notifications I received were incorrect. I've also attempted three times to update my profile pic for Halloween, and that's having issues. (Android user, yes I rebooted several times after yesterday's updates)

Yelp just cost me $75 in overages on my data plan because it's CONSTANTLY running in the background! It sucked 5.5 GB in one day! Apparently my phone settings were reset during an update, but this should NEVER have happened! Why do you need that much data from me?!
This app used 5 gb of my data from the background. I haven't even opened the app over a month but it's running in the background for some reason and takes up a lot of your data.

Uninstalled. I don't feel I have a use for your service anymore because of the recent unnecessary expansion of your business to implement a system of extrajudicial shaming/punishment, based solely on likely false or dubious accusations & without any semblance of due process, thru the awarding of special badges to businesses you feel are run or owned by those that you alone declare as undesirables. Try to not be too obvious with this badge however by making it a yellow star, pink triangle, etc.

Yelp has gotten worse then GOOGLE search when it comes to searching for the nearest business you search for. Your looking for a shell gas station then they put a station 3 times farther then you wanted as the 1 search! You drive past 3 stations to get to their 1 search results! I hope everyone who screwed up the yelp app to make more money instead of being actually a useful app dies of a horrible disease!

title: My Singing Monsters
description:
Welcome to My Singing Monsters! Breed them, feed them, listen to them sing! 

Raise a monster pet, then feed your musical monster to help them grow. Take care of a collection of fun monster characters in this free musical game for the whole family!

Create an island full of Singing Monsters, then watch your song evolve as you breed and upgrade happy monster pets. Design and build unique decorations to make your world look just the way you want, then share your creation with friends! You'll love exploring the wonderful fantasy land of the Monster World!

Download My Singing Monsters today ‚Äî Happy Monstering!

FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Collect and level up over 150 cute and funny monsters ‚Äî dragons are so last year‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢ Customize your islands with cool decorations and catchy music
‚Ä¢ Enjoy awesome graphics and character animation
‚Ä¢ Play with friends around the world
‚Ä¢ Discover new updates and events year-round
________

STAY TUNED:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MySingingMonsters
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/SingingMonsters
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mysingingmonsters
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/mysingingmonsters

PLEASE NOTE! My Singing Monsters is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. My Singing Monsters requires an internet connection to play (3G or WiFi).

HELP & SUPPORT: Get in touch with the Monster-Handlers by visiting www.bigbluebubble.com/support or contacting us in game by going to Options > Support.

comments: I mean, really just a stellar game. No real need to pay to win, good music (if it's to your taste), pretty smooth animation (in th later updates), very rewarding. Outside of the game itself, the fanbase is generally really nice, it has a respectable presence on the internet, and the creators very actively interact with the players. There's more to say, but the top reviews pretty much say it all. I reccomend just getting the game and trying it out. Also, would reccomend the prequel, Dawn of Fire

Great game, I have only played for a little bit and all ready love it. The progression is fast enough so you don't get bored an microtransactions are optional. I love the idea of your monsters making music and it adds a whole new level of wanting to get more monsters rather than a game that just let's you look at them. At least give this game a try.

I love this game, and I have a few ideas that would make this game SO MUCH BETTER! All I ask is that you respond to me because I would love to get your opinions on these! First, I think when looking through islands in the friends thing, and of course composer songs, you should add a search for artists and the names of songs. That would be a lot faster and easier. Second, I feel like you should add more monsters in the market on the composer island. Maybe trumpits, and add the Ghast as well. Thx!

This has to be one of the best games ever made. So creative to make singing monsters and put it into one perfect game. The free diamond offers actually worked for me, and then got Epic Noggin and Epic Punkleton in less than one hour using the diamonds! I got really lucky that time! Im rating this five stars and nothing can change that. I highly recommend you play it.

Really clever and well-done. You can tell the game designers put a lot of effort into the game. I bought a small pack of gems ($1 worth) several years ago that removed ads and opened up the option for some additional structures. That was a dollar well spent to support a game that's more than earned it, and my only purchase to date. I appreciate that although they make it well worth it to make a purchase, it's far from necessary to enjoy and do well. (Hint: patience + mini mines = diamonds)

comments: This app is awesome. All the songs you could want, no commercials. You got the videos, everything I like about YouTube minus the commercial interruptions. And you know that YouTube has got some long commercials when you're trying to listen and do other things, you have to stop, go stop the commercial so you can hear music again worse than radio!! This app is rocking!! My YouTube replacement. Did I mention you can download songs for offline listening. And its free!! What else could you ask for?

I love that I can make playlists & edit songs within the playlist(s) by adding or removing songs, plus you can sort the songs in the order you want. I love this App ..and recommend it to others; I already recommended it to F&F!

This app is definitely worth it no question. Tons of music available for any mood. And really good quality as well. But what there's more!!! Seemingly endless music and the app is very easy to use. Wide selection and user friendly what more could anyone possibly want. In the world of digital everything it's a win win.

Listen almost exclusively to this. At work, gym and car. I conveniently find all my trance favorites without interruption. I can also access other items such as Google, etc while still listening. Some of the initial advertising is odd, but I click past that and play my music. I dont have to hsve this open to a full screen to listen to. Its great for me but im not into mainstream music, I'm strictly older trance music which I find abundantly here.

This app is excellent I love it just sitting here finding all my music I'm so üíØ happy I've been looking for an app that doesn't give me a hard time about this is it, it's so easy and words can't describe what is happening to me now it's the best 5 üåü is excellent but not enough because this is more than I expected so much more to say keep it up much love and thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è this app is awesome ‚ò∫Ô∏èüòòüòòüòò

comments: This app is still ridiculous when it comes to making or receiving calls so I have resorted to using it only for texting. The texting service is also still incredibly slow- taking up to a minute. Yes, I know 1 minute is not a very long time... But when you need to see messages immediately and instead you're left staring at a screen yelling "come on already!!" It sucks.

The calling feature isn't great. I tried to use the minutes it gave me for free, but I couldn't get the speakerphone to come on, nor could I hear it ringing on the regular headset when I held it to my ear. The texts sometimes get sent in pieces missing half or more of the message which makes conversations hard to have with the people you're trying to get ahold of or speak with. Frustrating. But I like the layout of the app, it's visually pleasing, & there are plenty of great numbers to choose!

It used to be great, now it pops up ads every time you go back or try to click a different conversation. And on top of that it is horribly slow now. Edit: if you rely off ads to make money why am I paying you for minutes? This app used to run slick but now it is a chore to use and now every 1 out of 3 calls now I have to restart my phone cause it locks in the call and I can't end it cause it is loading an ad.

This app is okay for what it is. It has its problems. Sometimes it will drop a call, the person your talking to said it sounds like I am under water, I have fool signal and strong Wi-Fi and it cuts in and out like you have poor signal. Over all for a free app to make free calls it is manageable. Keep the app up to date it will get better. Thanks Textfree for the free app!

So far so good..update hey thanks pinger..yes without your professional services some could be in an emergency so this is very vital to have as I do use this as a backup ...text works great !! One time my phone went out of service and this worked wonderfully ‚ù§Ô∏è I think if I lose my phone that this is here as a safety net and I add money to this asap üòâ ..&goes along way ...for those whom need to know more I use this on phone & my 2tablets & pc has no carrier except textfree thank you so much.

title: Microsoft To Do: List, Task & Reminder
description:
Microsoft To Do is a task management app to help you stay organized and manage your day-to-day. You can use Microsoft To Do to make shopping lists or task lists, take notes, record collections, plan an event, or set reminders to increase your productivity and focus on what matters to you. Microsoft To Do makes it easy to stay organized and manage your life.

Accomplish what's meaningful and important to you each day with My Day and Suggestions, your personalized daily planner tools. Intelligent suggestions recommend tasks from across your lists that may be relevant for the day. From grocery lists to housecleaning routines, daily tasks are simple with To Do. When you're quickly switching between contexts and tasks, it's important to have tools that help you achieve what matters. Microsoft To Do helps you quickly capture and retrieve your lists and tasks across devices and between multiple accounts.

Capture tasks from different Microsoft apps and services and sync them with Microsoft To Do. Flag emails as tasks in Outlook or any email account hosted by Microsoft, add to lists with Cortana, and see tasks assigned to you from Microsoft Planner. Get peace of mind knowing that your tasks and lists are hosted on the Microsoft 365 service ‚Äì one of the most reliable services with industry-leading security offerings.

Microsoft To Do‚Äôs modern, easy-to-use experience makes your lists unique, with customizable features like emoji in lists, colorful themes, dark mode, and more. Plus, shared lists help you stay connected and collaborate with family, friends, and colleagues.
 
Microsoft To Do features:

Daily planner
‚Ä¢ A daily planner personalized with suggested tasks: My Day
‚Ä¢ To do lists are accessible anywhere, on any device
‚Ä¢ Share lists and assign tasks with your friends, family, colleagues, and classmates
‚Ä¢ Task management features break your tasks into manageable steps
‚Ä¢ Take notes to add to any task
‚Ä¢ Group lists together by topic or project

Task manager
‚Ä¢ Add reminders, tasks and lists with the To Do widget
‚Ä¢ Daily organizer personalized with bold and colorful backgrounds
‚Ä¢ Reminders with one-time or recurring due dates
‚Ä¢ Make task lists and switch between school, work, and personal lists 
‚Ä¢ Attach up to 25 MB of files to any task

To Do lists for any purpose
‚Ä¢ Bill planner
‚Ä¢ Shopping list
‚Ä¢ Reminders
‚Ä¢ Task management
‚Ä¢ Take notes
‚Ä¢ And more

Office 365 integration
‚Ä¢ Sync reminders and task lists between Outlook and To Do
‚Ä¢ Lists and tasks are hosted with the security of Microsoft 365
‚Ä¢ Task lists are compiled from the apps and services across Microsoft 365
‚Ä¢ Add multiple Microsoft accounts 

Microsoft To Do helps you organize and simplify your plans, whether it's for work, school, or home.

To Do is free and available across the web and iOS, Mac, Android, and Windows devices.
 
Learn more: https://to-do.microsoft.com
Follow us on Twitter: @MicrosoftToDo
Have an idea or feature suggestion? https://todo.uservoice.com/
Need support? https://todosupport.helpshift.com/
By installing Microsoft To Do, you agree to the Microsoft Terms of Use: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=842575

summary: Increase productivity! Make a daily to do list, create a reminder & share notes!
recentChanges: In this release we have made fixes to improve Sync in To Do.
comments: Love the app but have a few suggestions to make it even better. Have scheduled todo items show up on the Outlook calendar app; This would be awesome!! Have an option to hide certain lists from "my day". I have some lists I use as filler projects when there's free time and I don't want them taking priority over other necessary items I haven't scheduled yet. Thank you for a great app thus far!

For me, the best app for organizing your life. But some things should be improved though: 1. You can't set Monday as the first day of the week. 2. Having some of your notes appear both in Planned and Tasks and some in Planned but not in Tasks is bewildering. Besides Planned and Tasks there are two more lists - My Day and Important. Why so many overlapping lists? 3. You can't change fixed time for reminder alarm. For example, "tomorrow" is always at 9 a.m. You can't change that to, say, 10 a.m. 4. You can't set quick alarm. For example you can't type some note and then tap "remind me in half an hour" or in 15 minutes, in two hours etc. There's no such option. 5. You can't insert a photo or voice recording into your reminders. 6. You can't protect your reminders and notes with a password. Anyone can read them.

Redudant and limiting. There should be a way to share specific lists, but keep some private-a "Honey-Do"list; to be able to schedule minders for the 3rd level items and further break down tasks; to be able to reorder 3rd level sending completed to bottom; to be able to prioritize which list I want at the top and if I don't use Important, Planned, Tasks, then I want to move it down and pin what I want on top; to be able to set custom alarms, not notifications, for very important things...

Used to take the place of Wunderlist. Actually liking it much better. It would be helpful to see who created the task, who edited it and when. Also being able to add comments others would notice was an addition, or ask questions on it that would alert the creator there was a comment/question, would be super helpful. Other than that, very satisfied.

Granted, I just downloaded the app, but I have yet to find anything useful about it. Copy/pasting in and then reorganizing a basic task list took me about a half hour (seriously? No drag and drop?) and I haven't been able to figure out how to share a task list with someone else. If I can't share the task list, why is there an "assigned to me" toggle? Instructions on the MS website seem to be referencing a completely different version than the one I have. Utterly useless and frustrating.

Editor: D. Joanne Lynn, MD and Herbert B. Newton, MD, FAAN
Publisher: Wolters Kluwer Health | Lippincott Williams & Wilkins
ISBN-13: 978-1451100129

FULL DESCRIPTION:
A resource from the 5-Minute Consult series that focuses on neurological diseases and disorders, as well as key symptoms, signs, and tests. This latest update is based on the 2nd edition with additional features, enhanced functionality and ongoing updates.

5-Minute Neurology Consult provides instant access to comprehensive, clinically-oriented, must-have information on all disorders of the nervous system in the popular 5-Minute format.

Key Features
Dozens of noted authorities provide tightly organized, practical guidance
Each disease is covered in a consistent, easy-to-follow format which includes signs and symptoms, diagnosis, treatment, medications, follow-up, diseases with similar characteristics, pregnancy, synonyms, and ICD coding
Significantly revised and expanded coverage in areas such as stroke therapy, multiple sclerosis, neurogenetic disorders, and Lewy Body dementia
Uniform Topic organization to facilitate quick reference
Includes 1 calculator & 1 flowchart to assist in making clinical decisions

SPECIAL FEATURES:
Locate a disease, symptom or medication in the fastest possible manner:
- Tap and Hold launch icon to open Last Topic, History, Favorites ..
- Navigate using multiple indices
- History to open frequently visited pages
- Bookmarks 

NEVER FORGET ANYTHING:
Mark topics with relevant information:
- Voice Notes
- Annotations with scribble, doodle or text
You choose the method to note this regardless of the context you are in to ensure that the important facts are available whenever you access the topic, whether it is tomorrow or six months from now.

recentChanges:
All new words are waiting for you to draw them!
Add in a few special updates and there‚Äôs never been a better time to Draw Something.
So, update now!
comments: I love the game, but hate the ads. I'd gladly pay to get rid of ads, but I won't randomly throw my Facebook friends under the bus, and that's the only way to get rid of ads - temporarily even. You can leave the option to watch ads to get extra coins or bombs, but let us pay to avoid the pushed ads! Game glitches and splits the drawing in half and doubles it. When trying to play a new player, 80% resign immediately.

30 second ads that you can't skip after EVERY turn is ridiculous. I played it years ago and picked it up again a few days ago. It was much more fun then. Now it's gone way downhill. The word bank is limited, you can't delete games if the other player doesn't take their turn, and it's full of bugs and crashes constantly. Unfortunately, I'll be deleting.

Ads are more intrusive and frequent than any other app. Game is fine, little outdated, but the ads are off-putting, and designed to make you "accidentally" click them often. It makes me not want to log in, knowing that over half of my time will be spent waiting for 30 second videos to end. Suggestions: 1) Less ads: offer a way to earn coins to PERMANENTLY remove them. 2) Make it easier to choose colour pallets. 3) Men instantly quit when playing with other men, which is slimy and embarrassing.

they've added a feature where you can run out of ink I have a galaxy note, meaning I have a fairly large screen and a touch pen, so I want to use this game to make elaborate drawings for my friends. For years I'd randomly pick up this game on occasion and always had fun until this time when I ran out of ink and had to send a masterpiece drawing incomplete.

Ads are never fun and this game seems child oriented. The problem is some of the ads may contain some mature target audience content. Good app though. Someone might be crass and draw something inappropriate and the recipient might not be very old which could be bad. Should be an age filter so adults can play with adults and children can play with children. I had some adult words (toyota? Kids not going to know that) and I was playing with my nephews (6 and 9).

recentChanges: We make regular updates to improve your travels.
comments: As others have said, the app is currently broken. You can only sign in after you reset your password, and even if you do, the app fails to load upcoming trips. Other things are customer unfriendly. For example, if I want to cancel a trip, you now have to chat with a bot (versus just being able to do a simple "click-and-cancel" request). I understand that it may help Expedia's contact deflection measures, but it feels needlessly complicated.

As of October 2020, the app has gotten much worse. Don't bother with it. Original comments: Works, but limited. You get a lot more choices on the webpage than you do in the app; so shopping for travel is mediocre. However, great to have your itineraries on the app. It would be nice if it stored full itineraries locally in case no connection.

Was a pretty good app. Now will not show trips after you book them.. dates change between starting seach and booking. Have had several booking only to show up to hotel or car rental place to find out my booking dates are wrong sometimes days weeks and even months away from the dates I chose. Expedia points not worth the hassles of miss placed bookings maybe time to use a new service if they don't fix this soon!!! Ridiculous that these bugs lasted more then a few days....

The app is very broken. When I open it I am greeted to a screen that is flashing and not responsive. When I go to close the app it opens back up and I have to fight with it. It was a good app before all this mess. Best part is my trip is in 3 days and I'm stuck using the browser on my cell phone. Just fix it.

I rated this app earlier 5 star because it used to work really smooth. Now whenever I try to log in, it makes me do the image authentication plus makes me log in again. I liked it when it was simple and kept me logged on. I want to give it 5 star, so please help me with this so I can update this rating.

title: Neurology cases
description:
Neurology Cases is your indispensable guide to neurology for clinical exams and OSCEs.  Covering all of the cases you‚Äôre likely to encounter, Neuro Cases provides all you need to know about physical signs, causes, investigations, treatment and prognosis for major common neurological presentations and conditions including:
- Facial palsy
- Spastic paraparesis and other spinal presentations (syrinx, Brown-Sequard, subacute combined degeneration of the cord)
- Motor neuron disease/ALS
- Foot drop
- Common compression palsies: ulnar neuropathy, carpal tunnel syndrome, radial neuropathy, common peroneal neuropathy
- Multiple sclerosis
- Cerebellar ataxia
- Myotonic dystrophy
- Peripheral neuropathy
- Myopathy
- Eye movement and pupillary disorders
- Visual field defects
- Hemiparesis and stroke
- Parkinsonism and Parkinson's disease
- Myasthenia gravis

I thought the app was awesome when I first got it and was more than happy to pay to unlock extra features. Now I've come back to using it after a break and found that despite paying for the additional features I now no longer have them and have to wait to unlock them. Cool app, but if I pay for a feature I should keep it, even if you update the way the app works.
App was nice until they've changed the subscription to a monthly one. I've previously paid for the full version only to have it revoked with their new subscription system.

title: NeuroScores App
description:
La aplicaci√≥n NeuroScores, ha sido creada por la Dra. Nerea Foncea, especialista en Neurolog√≠a del Hospital de Galdakao (Vizcaya-Espa√±a).
No hay metodolog√≠a sin instrumentos y esta aplicaci√≥n se convertir√°, con toda seguridad, en un recurso importante en la actividad cl√≠nica frente a nuestros pacientes.
Nace con la intenci√≥n de ofrecer una herramienta √∫til en nuestra consulta, que, aparte de ofrecer un contenido, permite acceder al mismo de una forma r√°pida e intuitiva.
Pensada para Neur√≥logos y M√©dicos de Atenci√≥n Primaria, Psiquiatras y Psic√≥logos.  
En esta aplicaci√≥n se incluyen escalas que se utilizan en la valoraci√≥n de los enfermos neurol√≥gicos, as√≠ como su evoluci√≥n en el tiempo.
Se han incluido 70 escalas, aquellas que la autora ha considerado m√°s √∫tiles de la especialidad, clasificadas en funci√≥n de la patolog√≠a a la que pertenecen.
Son escalas utilizadas en Parkinson, Epilepsia, Cefalea, Demencia, Trastornos del movimiento, Coma, Depresi√≥n, Esclerosis M√∫ltiple e Ictus.
La importante ventaja que ofrece NeuroScores, es que usted s√≥lo tiene que marcar las diferentes opciones y la aplicaci√≥n calcula el resultado final de una forma autom√°tica, ofreciendo la posibilidad de enviar el resultado por email a la direcci√≥n que se desee o guardar el test realizado.
Adem√°s se han incluido otras herramientas, que consideramos que pueden ser un instrumento muy pr√°ctico para utilizar en el d√≠a a d√≠a en nuestras consultas, centro m√©dicos y hospitales. Entre ellas, un apartado de exploraci√≥n neurol√≥gica eminentemente pr√°ctico, con im√°genes exclusivas da las maniobras exploratorias.
Esta aplicaci√≥n est√° dirigida √∫nica y exclusivamente a los profesionales sanitarios y el diagn√≥stico que se obtiene de las escalas de valoraci√≥n en ning√∫n caso sustituye el diagn√≥stico del profesional sanitario realizado en la consulta m√©dica.
Esta aplicaci√≥n ha sido patrocinada por el laboratorio ESTEVE.

title: Video Maker for YouTube - Video.Guru
description:

comments: I love this editor, it's easy to use, doesn't crash like others I have tried. The 4 instead of 5 stars is simply because of the time it takes to process the final video. Other apps for a 5 minute video takes around 5-7 minutes, this one took 30 minutes, which to me is far too long. Especially when some of my videos will be at least 15 minutes long. I'm dreading the wait on those ones.

Awesome easy to use video editor! Many great features. I accessed and edited right from the videos on my Android phone! Others I tried were awkward and not as many simple to use features. Try it out and 0lay around with the music and effects , just to name two out of dozens. You'll love it! No, I don't work for the developer! LolüòÅ

This is great app. No watermarks and excellent editing software capabilities. Easily rivals computer editing software. My only problem is there's no backspace or Ctrl+Z (however you wanna say it) so if you make a mistake, you can't undo it. Please add one and this will be my new favourite editing app. It's also user friendly! :D highly recommend

I've used it once so far but it is very handy. It has variety of music and I read the option to even put your own. It allows you to add to your photos as text, transitions, music, and many other things!! What I had used was ALL FREE. Definitely recommend. There are adds but eh everything has ads now-a-days

It's actually nice and user friendly specially for the ones who aren't that 'techy' . However, there was one problem that I faced which was that when you try to add any media at the starting of the video once it has been made, the whole audio that is attached to the previous media moves in front and leading to all the audios to move ahead. When you try to push the audio back it actually kind of gets trimmed.

title: Adobe Acrobat Reader: PDF Viewer, Editor & Creator
description:
Adobe Acrobat Reader is the most reliable, free global standard document management system available. View, edit, sign, and annotate PDF documents by working directly on the text.

Adobe Acrobat Reader is the free global standard for reliably viewing, signing, and commenting on PDF documents. 

VIEW PDFs
‚Ä¢ Quickly open and view PDF documents.
‚Ä¢ Search, scroll, and zoom in and out.
‚Ä¢ Choose Single Page or Continuous scroll mode.

ANNOTATE PDFs 
‚Ä¢ Comment on PDFs directly using sticky notes and drawing tools.
‚Ä¢ Annotate documents easily with highlights and markup texts.
‚Ä¢ View and respond to activity in the comments list.

WORK WITH OTHERS AND SHARE PDFs
‚Ä¢ Access shared documents quickly. Simply view, review, sign and send.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with others by adding your comments to shared PDFs. 
‚Ä¢ Receive activity notifications for files you‚Äôve shared.
‚Ä¢ Track pending actions for documents shared with you.
‚Ä¢ Sharing PDFs is made effortless. Create links you can send by email.

WORK WITH SCANNED DOCUMENTS
‚Ä¢ Access scanned PDFs that you‚Äôve captured using the free Adobe Scan app.
‚Ä¢ Upload and sign documents. Open your scans in Acrobat Reader to fill, sign, review, and share.

FILL AND SIGN FORMS
‚Ä¢ Easily fill out and sign PDF forms and other documents by typing text into fields.
‚Ä¢ PDF form filler feature lets you use your finger or stylus to add an e-signature to any document.

STORE AND PRINT FILES
‚Ä¢ Sign in to your free Adobe Document Cloud account to store and access files across devices.
‚Ä¢ Star files to keep important documents at your fingertips.
‚Ä¢ Connect to your Dropbox account and access other storage providers including Google Drive.
‚Ä¢ Print documents directly from your device.

CONNECT TO GOOGLE DRIVE
‚Ä¢ Access PDFs and other files stored on your Google Drive with ease.
‚Ä¢ Create, view, edit, combine, compress, export, share, and star Google Drive files directly in Acrobat Reader.

IN-APP PURCHASE
Subscribe for even more PDF power. Subscriptions work across mobile and web.
‚Ä¢ Organize and edit PDFs.
‚Ä¢ Create PDF files from documents or images.
‚Ä¢ Export PDFs to Microsoft Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.
‚Ä¢ Compress PDFs to reduce file size.
‚Ä¢ Combine files into one PDF.
‚Ä¢ Protect PDFs with Password.

Adobe Acrobat Reader is a free PDF creator and document editor allows you to easily convert JPG files to PDF format and create and sign fillable PDF forms. Add your e-signature to shared documents and send them to colleagues for fast, efficient and paperless collaboration.

Adobe Acrobat Reader is a Microsoft Intune supported partner app and accommodates multiple identities.

Terms & Conditions: Your use of this application is governed by the Adobe General Terms of Use 
http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_en and the Adobe Privacy Policy http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_en

Do Not Sell My Information: https://www.adobe.com/privacy/ca-rights.html

comments: The app opens and allows me to fill in my pre-made forms. The problem is I can't 'save as' to a different file name within the app which is stopping me from easily reusing the form. I can't even rename a file within the app! If it doesn't get resolved soon I'll have to stop my subscription. Edit: Also urgently needed is the option to 'flatten' documents so as filled in forms can't be changed by someone else later. Even free apps allow this. Now cancelled my subscription until Adobe sort this.

This is useful for editing PDF files i have to edit. But there is some problems that makes it annoying to use: 1.using Fill and Sign Text sometimes undoes itself for no reason. So you must save alot of times which is annoying. 2 sometimes saving also undoes some text 3 there is no copy and paste (well you can paste but you cannot select a text to copy it.)

Great extension of the powerful desktop application. The PDF ecosystem is mature and well functioning. There is just no way around Adobe if you want to get the best out of it, especially on the creation side. But seriously, make your applications faster again. They are becoming bloated and slow.

Very convenient though the Adobe Acrobat I love PDFs makes it easier to print and keep on my papers without losing them except for when I have my other account I can't get into it I need all those documents you know what I can do other than that I love it no complaints here really keep up the good work

2020.10.28 redownloaded too see: it's still doing it. Whatever update you guys made this year anything I've downloaded the page gets cut off when you zoom in on reading mode, it's highly annoying - unreadable! I've sent reports and nothing got fixed yet!

title: Airbnb
description:
Unforgettable travel experiences start with Airbnb. Find travel adventures and new places to go far away or near to you, and access vacation home rentals, new experiences, and places to visit all around the world. Book everything for your trip, or start earning money as a host. 

BOOK TRAVEL EXPERIENCES
Go on local experiences led by native experts, whether it‚Äôs for multiple days or just an afternoon. Explore Seoul's underground music scene, hunt for truffles in a Tuscan forest, or give back to the community with a social impact experience.

BOOK VACATION HOMES
Choose from over 6 million vacation home rentals across 191+ countries. Search by price, neighborhood, amenities, and more.

POPULAR DESTINATIONS
Experience the beautiful sights & find local guides for the perfect vacation:
‚Ä¢ Rio ‚Äì Explore the birthplace of Samba or hang glide over the sights
‚Ä¢ Paris ‚Äì Find your fill in some of the best culinary tours and museums
‚Ä¢ Barcelona ‚Äì Discover the cities beauty with guided walking tours

For travelers: 
‚Ä¢ Book vacation home rentals and travel experiences for your next solo journey, family vacation, or business trip
‚Ä¢ Search for last minute travel accommodations or long term rentals
‚Ä¢ Save your favorite rental homes, experiences, and places‚Äîand invite friends and family to plan the trip with you
‚Ä¢ Add experiences and events to your itinerary
‚Ä¢ Message your host and get directions to your home

For hosts:
‚Ä¢ Share your extra space or lead experiences that showcase what makes your city great
‚Ä¢ Update your listing and calendar availability
‚Ä¢ Share what‚Äôs special about your neighborhood with a host guidebook
‚Ä¢ Message guests and manage their reservations

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: UI has confusing layout. Political posturing on the front page but no 'check in' button to be seen. Cancels reservations over BS "identity verification" or something with two days of notice. I have verified ID in app and 6 stays, only thing that happened is my card blocked an attempted charge one time. I verified that card and nope, still denied. Support claims the host rejected my request, they are lying. I have two days to find something else and my car was just totaled. These dinks unreliable

We have used Airbnb many times both for overnight stays and experiences. The site itself is ready to use and accurate. I appreciate the feature that shows what the total will be because sometimes cleaning fees are extreme and a person needs to know that before they commit. I also like when there is clarity about specific cancellation fees for each location.

Today I am very pissed off. I booked a location through this app about a week ago and today I am trying to make another reservation and they are saying my account has been locked for security proposes. Every time I try to review my account to it sends me back to the same log in screen. There is no number to call and fix the problem and I can't get around the log in screen.

I have been using Airbnb application for more than three years and the fact that it has the same bugs from time to time is unacceptable. The switch account button appears and disappears. Even when it "decides" to appear some of the times it does not "remember" the codes of the switched account. But to make it even better after I log in to the other account I see in the listings panel listings of the previous account I just logged out. If I had space I would write more. Totally unprofessional.

I love the idea, and regularly use Airbnb, but I'm keen to jump ship for the first competitor who allows me to access the original posting for the booked trips within the app. I find it incredibly irksome to be forced to a computer for one of the most frequently desired actions that logically should be available in the app. I often need to revisit to confirm details from the pictures etc but you simply can't here. If it wasn't for communicating with hosts, I'd uninstall and do desktop only.

title: KnowYourMeds
description:
KnowYourMeds is your digital health assistant that enables you to manage your health and any health-related conditions effectively. It tracks your vitals, sends you pill reminders, keeps you aware of drug interactions, including possible side-effects, and informs you about the latest information related to your drugs, chronic conditions and overall health. 
KnowYourMeds has several features that make it the perfect app for managing your health, and your family‚Äôs too! 


Medication Management 
Never miss a pill again, or even re-filling the prescription for one! The medication management features of this app make sure that you are taking your meds in a timely fashion without risking any harmful interactions with food or other drugs.  
With KnowYourMeds, get the benefits of: 
‚è∞ Pill reminders 
‚è∞ Refill reminders 
‚ö†Ô∏è Drug interaction warnings 
üíäDrug to drug interaction checker 
üçö Drug to food interaction checker  
üóìÔ∏è Customizable schedule 
‚úÖ Adherence monitoring/sharing 
üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ Family and caregiving management 
üì¢Provider Communications
 
 
Condition management 
The condition management feature provides guidance to the user to track certain health metrics appropriately for their medical condition, allows them to monitor symptoms, track side effects, medication adherence, and provides the user the ability to share their progress with their doctor. 
Stay on top of your medical condition with: 
üìñCondition information 
ü©∫Vitals tracking 
üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ Monitor dependents conditions 
üë• Community support 
 
Health Management 
The KnowYourMeds digital health assistant acts as your buddy helping monitor your health and guiding you in your journey towards a healthier, more engaged life. 
  
Take charge of your health with: 
üìñ Health education 
üíäNutritional supplements learning
üßòüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èHealthy lifestyle management 
 
A wealth of information on your fingertips! 
With an exhaustive database of medicines, latest research on current trends in healthcare, and curated information on the side-effects/drug interactions, KnowYourMeds is an all-in-one tool/app for your health. Our information is curated from a wealth of sources like Food and Drug Administration (FDA), World Health Organization (WHO), Cerner Multum and other renowned medical professionals. We make this information easy to access, easy to understand and relevant to the individual‚Äôs personal health with the help of AI and machine learning, so that they are better equipped and self-driven in managing their health.

comments: KnowYourMeds is a very easy to use app to manage your medications. You can set daily reminders to take your meds and can check for adverse reactions between medications.
This is a fantastic app! Extremely helpful...there are notifications reminding me to take my medications. At the end of the day, it also asks if I have taken all the pills. Highly recommended!
Dosage schedule options are: Daily Weekly Monthly As needed However this does NOT account for meds taken BIWEEKLY. Not all meds are as simple as a set schedule folks.
They added a save button in med tracking and now it works!

Very useful! The reminders are great, and the push notifications aren't overdone. Learned a lot about drug interactions. Also offers a lot of unexpected features like vitals tracking and appointment reminders. It does a lot more than what I downloaded it for. Worth a try for sure.

comments: Sometimes app do not sync with watch. I need my data back. I use to do 10-15K for Oct 2020. All of a sudden I could not see 10k being tracked. I could not contact customer service as there seems to be no hotline or whatsapp help. Example: I was about 7500steps until 11.30pm and I ran 2.36kms which is more than 3000 steps for sure and that did not sync to health app. This is totally frustrating.looks like a bug. I need it to be fixed. Calories also did not sync properly.

Not much user friendly to use, Bluetooth does not auto connect, it does not shows in scan,device name is not shown in bluetooth scan list but still it connect ,I guess that's a bug to be solved,Cannot see data in app offline you need to manually connect even if its paired .App does not open offline.Most of the Honor watch ES features are not shown in app,require to update features,Need lot of improvement as compared to other Health apps.After that it can be eligible for 5 star rating

I would really appreciate an easy way to export the data in a standard file format like csv or xml or gpx in case of tracks. Transfer of tracks from the GT2 watch to this app is very scetchy. The watch appears to register gps signals ok but only a small part of these data gdts transferred to the app. As many others i would like to be able to deselect step counting devices e.g. when carryimg both a watch and a phone. What is really ennoying is that max heart rate is consistently reset to 190

Very Poor app and watch experience coming from Garmin. I REALLY regret going backwards to Huewel. I now have my time wasted to sell and migrate back, the watch features could be good, if you could export data to a useable app I would probably still keep the system. Happy with the way the watch looks like overall EXTREMELY DISSAPPONTED about everything else. UPDATE I've now bought a Garmin and once it arrives life will soon be good again

Still there's no option to chose the source of step count, the app automatically merges data from phone and the band. This is extremely inaccurate! Tons of people complain about this missing feature for YEARS! This could be fixed easily, yet Huawei still don't care about the feedback of their customers. Shame on you! Guess what? Never gonna spend money on Huawei products because of 0 customer support.

title: VLC for Android
description:
VLC media player is a free and open source cross-platform multimedia player that plays most multimedia files as well as discs, devices, and network streaming protocols.

This is the port of VLC media player to the Android‚Ñ¢ platform. VLC for Android can play any video and audio files, as well as network streams, network shares and drives, and DVD ISOs, like the desktop version of VLC.

VLC for Android is a full audio player, with a complete database, an equalizer and filters, playing all weird audio formats.

VLC is intended for everyone, is totally free, has no ads, no in-app-purchases, no spying and is developed by passionate volunteers. All the source code is available for free.


Features
‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì
VLC for Android‚Ñ¢ plays most local video and audio files, as well as network streams (including adaptive streaming), DVD ISOs, like the desktop version of VLC. It also support disk shares.

All formats are supported, including MKV, MP4, AVI, MOV, Ogg, FLAC, TS, M2TS, Wv and AAC. All codecs are included with no separate downloads. It supports subtitles, Teletext and Closed Captions.

VLC for Android has a media library for audio and video files, and allows to browse folders directly.

VLC has support for multi-track audio and subtitles. It supports auto-rotation, aspect-ratio adjustments and gestures to control volume, brightness and seeking.

It also includes a widget for audio control, supports audio headsets control, cover art and a complete audio media library.


Permissions
‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì
VLC for Android needs access to those categories:
‚Ä¢ "Photos/Media/Files" to read your all media files :)
‚Ä¢ "Storage" to read your all media files on SD cards :)
‚Ä¢ "Other" to check network connections, change the volume, set the ringtone, run on Android TV and display the popup view, see below for details.

Permission Details :
‚Ä¢ It needs "read the contents of your USB storage", in to order to read your media files on it.
‚Ä¢ It needs "modify or delete the contents of your USB storage", in order to allow deletion of files and store subtitles.

‚Ä¢ It needs "full network access", to open network and internet streams.
‚Ä¢ It needs "prevent phone from sleeping" in order to prevent... your phone from sleeping when watching a video.
‚Ä¢ It needs "change your audio settings", in order to change audio volume.
‚Ä¢ It needs "modify system settings", in order to allow you to change your audio ringtone.
‚Ä¢ It needs "view network connections" in order to monitor whether device is connected or not.
‚Ä¢ It needs "draw over other apps" to start the custom picture-in-picture widget.
‚Ä¢ It needs "control vibration" to give feedback on the controls.
‚Ä¢ It needs "run at startup" to set recommendations on Android TV launcher screen, only used on Android TV devices.
‚Ä¢ It needs "microphone" to provide voice search on Android TV devices, only asked on Android TV devices.

recentChanges:
* Video: mark as played
* Audio: chapter selection for audio books
* TV: improve PiP behavior
* Video player: increase icons' size
* Thumbnails: fix quality issue
* Fix Chromecast disconnection
* Remove sliders haptic feedback

comments: Used to be my favorite media player app on all devices, but no more. PC version is still great, but the Android version can no longer log into my samba server. It did not work great, I had to quit and restart ever so often to re-access folders, but at least this workaround existed. Now this (for me) most essential feature is broken. Now I use MX Player for my smb needs. That works ok, but MX Player does not support casting to Chromecast anywhere near as well as VLC used to.

Prior to the current update, this app was 5 stars. Every part of it was magnificent and truly revolutionary. A free all encompassing media player with a built in preamp, no ads being shoved down your throat, and a beautiful interface. However, the current update removes the latter, making it look like a Facebook clone, as well as adds significant slowdowns and lag spikes. At times, I have to wait 10-15 seconds for my song to play, an "instantaneous" action. The prior was better, but still fine.

was the best app for my audio files. started "parsing media" all the time a couple of months ago, and today, it completely lost all of my files. sad. now I have to find a new media playerüòü Update 10/25/2020: reinstalled this app on my new phone, and it worked great! . . . Until it was updated. Then it lost most of my files, and I had to uninstall it. Again. It seems like this app is either 5 stars or 1 star depending on the updates, so I'm going to give it 3 stars for average.

Before current update, was 5-star. Now it's incredibly buggy. Biggest problems I've encountered is that media continues to play when app is closed, and random album art assigned to any audio files without existing art. The former is especially irritating. New interface is also much more awkward. Looking for a new media player.

I have used VLC for more than ten years -- on Macs, PCs, Linux, and Android. Beginning with this version, I can no longer manually load subtitles, which makes the app unusable on my Android devices. I am currently working on removing it from my tablet and manually installing an older version. Sorry, but this has gone from being the best media player on the planet, to becoming a major fail.

title: Fallout Shelter
description:
** Google Play Best of 2015  **
Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE Awards
Winner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game

"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat
"Probably the best game of E3 2015‚Äù ‚Äì Gizmodo 
"Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZone

BUILD THE PERFECT VAULT
Create a brighter future‚Ä¶underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.

OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY 
Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.

CUSTOMIZE
Turn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.

PROSPER
A well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly! 

EXPLORE THE WASTELAND 
Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don‚Äôt let them die!

PROTECT YOUR VAULT
From time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside‚Ä¶and within.

Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.

recentChanges:
Spooky fun from Vault-Tec as Halloween returns to the Vault!
Can you solve the ‚ÄúMystery of Vault 31‚Äù Halloween quest?
Customize your rooms with Halloween d√©cor.
Dress your dwellers in Halloween outfits ‚Äì now that‚Äôs the spirit!
Spooky fun from Vault-Tec as Halloween returns to the Vault! Update today!
comments: I really enjoy this game! I love the fallout series as well as the elder scrolls games, Bethesda is by far the best. Now this game has some things it could use, one of those is the ability to move rooms around without destroying them, or even widen the vault a bit so you can fit three full rooms along with 2 or 3 elevators. I also wish the rarity chance was a teensy bit higher for legendary dwellers, there are more things, but I only have 500 letters to use. Fix those two and I'll update this :)

Good graphics, good gameplay, no "it is free-to-play, but pay us or wait for years to finish building", no "you will play forever no matter what mistakes you do" (you can lose and it makes you think what to do). You do not have to play each day (do not afraid of missing something or losing state). You can even select difficult level! It is something I missed from old time. One of great games for smartphone, I like it!

It feels like a game to download just to kill time, but I'm addicted to it. I love the graphics and the humor. And the only time you get ads is when you want to skip something for free, there is not a ton of ads like most other games. I love to name the characters and RP what life in the vault would be like and turn on fallout music on youtube in the background. It's the best free game I've played in a long time. Thank you so much to the developers for making us this game for free. ‚ù§Ô∏è

I love this game. And have for years. However upon getting into contact with the developer, days later they've ignored me on multiple accounts. Ive emailed them around a half dozen times and they've only responded 3 times. All of which was not helpful. And now, not only do I feel completely scammed, I feel disrespected as a player. Take this into consideration if you make a purchase. They will suck at communicating back with you.

Would be 5 stars but there's a glitch that adds 270+ hours to the daily reward and that isn't great. Edit: I have now changed my review from 4 stars to 1 star because as of the new update I am unable to actually load the game. It asked for access to media and files, which is fine, but then it started a weird download and once it finishes the game gets stuck in a frozen loading screen. Closing and reopening the app just restarts the download. Please fix and I'll change my review back to 4 star.

title: Pear-006
description:
Pear-006 is a prescription digital therapeutic under investigation to treat depressive symptoms in patients with Multiple Sclerosis (MS).

‚Ä®‚Ä®It is expected to deliver access to cognitive behavioral therapy for people with MS under clinician supervision.

CAUTION: Pear-006 is an investigational therapeutic device. It is limited by United States law to investigational use. Pear-006 is not yet available for sale in the United States.

title: The Sims‚Ñ¢ FreePlay
description:
From the creators of The Sims‚Ñ¢ comes a complete Sims experience on mobile! Grow SimTown to expand your Sim community and create an entire town with your own style, personalities and dreams!¬†Complete goals to earn Simoleons and pick up rewards along the way. Keep your Sims happy and watch them thrive as you help them live a fun and fulfilled life!
_________________

SIM-ULATING POSSIBILITIES
From head to toe ‚Äì and floor to ceiling ‚Äì customize every aspect of your Sims‚Äô lives! Keep up to 34 Sims looking stylish, and design and build their dream homes complete with swimming pools, multiple floors and incredible decor. As you get more Sims and they start a family, expand your Sim Town with a pet store, car dealership, shopping mall, and even a private villa beach! Express yourself and tell your own Sims story by unleashing your inner architect and interior designer all at once. Visit your real friends‚Äô Sim Towns, where you can form new relationships and compare your friends‚Äô interior design skills against yours.

STAY CONNECTED
Life is better together. Start relationships, fall in love, get married, and have a family. Make lifelong friends and care for pets. Throw pool parties and grill outdoors or snuggle up by the fireplace for movie night. In the mood for some trouble? There‚Äôs plenty of drama to be had when Sims don‚Äôt get along. Act silly with teens, be rude to family members, or even say no to a marriage proposal! From babies to seniors, your perfect Sims story can happen at every stage of your life simulation. Love and friendships? Drama and breakups? The choice is always yours.

ALL WORK & ALL PLAY
A Sim‚Äôs gotta work! Start different dream careers, and even follow Sims‚Äô days at the Police Station, Movie Studio, and Hospital. The more your Sims go to work, the more they learn skills and raise their salary, giving you rewards and setting them on a path to success. In their free time, choose different hobbies like cooking, fashion design, salsa dancing, and puppy training. The more involved they are, the happier they‚Äôll be, from kids to teens to adults. The opportunities are limitless when you create a life your Sims love!

_________________

FOLLOW US at
Twitter @TheSimsFreePlay
Facebook.com/TheSimsFreePlay
Instagram @TheSimsFreePlayEA
_________________

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game requires 1.8GB total storage.
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings. 
- Advertising appears in this game.
- A network connection is required to play.

contentRatingDescription: Fantasy Violence, Sexual Content, Partial Nudity, Crude Humor
recentChanges:
Care Bears are bringing sunshine to SimTown, guaranteed to make the world feel a little less blue! In the latest update of The Sims FreePlay, you‚Äôll enjoy:

The ‚ÄòShare Your Care‚Äô live event with Share Bear and Grumpy Bear. Earn a magical ‚ÄòCare A Lot‚Äô Community Center grand prize plus Care Bears plush toys, onesies and more!

Going trick-or-treating with your Sims! Get seriously spooked in SimChase: Scare Bears with Trick-Or-Sweet Bear.

Thanks for playing!
comments: I LOVE the Sims games. I've been a LOOOOOONG time player, including the first pc games. But the simchase episodes kill me. I work my butt of trying to complete the challenges in time to get the prizes but the last 4 episodes tend to be impossible! The tasks take longer and longer to complete, while the challenger seems to fly through them. Paying big bucks seems like the only way to get any of the prizes. What a shame. I already know I'm going to lose yet again.

It could be better. Needs more updates than you think, our sims disappear after a while and need to make new ones, glitched money meaning expensive houses are free. Not the common sense I'd like from a game as this. The graphics and music is old. Please update that too. In other words furniture and housing is beautiful. Thank you for the new style for sims as well. With that being said the game has been untouched, only "events" happen but never music, graphics, quality has ever changed.

I know writing this review is a waste of time cause the developers only care about your money. The more you play the more expensive it will cost you. The quests are taking longer times and the only way to beat them is to spend your money. And on top of that half of my simoleons disappeared over night. Some quests want you to use 11 sims but the game will only allow 6 at a time so it takes twice as long to complete. So a 3 hour quest is now 6 hours. If it stays Ike this I will delete the game.

I just wasted 500,000 simoleons that I payed for on this "Simschase" event. I was constantly checking the game to start the next task, but I still lost every episode because I have to go to school, and sleep and actually have a life. I bought the simoleons with real money and it all got thrown away. I can't skip tasks because the only way to get social points is to have Facebook friends who also play the game. I should not have to pay and pay and pay just to play this game.

Game has gotten worse. Being forced to start events or stupid Simchase thing. Having to clear app cache and data every so often to make sure game doesn't screw up. Only reason I keep the game is so that my wife has a neighbor now that Facebook has cleared inactive players from the database. They send out updates without testing them. Too much content in a short span of time. Now looks like you have to spend real money to get things to complete tasks.

title: Any.do: To do list, Reminders, Planner & Calendar
description:
üèÜ Editor's Choice by Google

It's the #1 to-do list, reminders, planner & calendar app.
Over 30M people rely on Any.do to stay organized and get more done.

ü•á "A MUST HAVE APP" (Lifehacker, NYTimes, USA TODAY, WSJ).

Any.do is a  free to-do list, planner & calendar app for managing and organizing your daily tasks, to-do lists, notes, reminders, checklists, calendar events, grocery lists and more.

üìÖ Organize your tasks & to-do list

‚Ä¢ ADVANCED CALENDAR & DAILY PLANNER - Keep your to-do list and calendar events always at hand with our calendar widget. Any.do to-do list & planner support daily calendar view, 3-day Calendar view, Weekly calendar view & agenda view, with built-in reminders. Review and organize your calendar events and to do list side by side.

‚Ä¢ SYNCS SEAMLESSLY - Keeps all your to do list, tasks, reminders, notes, calendar & agenda always in sync so you‚Äôll never forget a thing. Sync your phone‚Äôs calendar, google calendar, Facebook events, outlook calendar or any other calendar so you don‚Äôt forget an important event.

‚Ä¢ SET REMINDERS - One time reminders, recurring reminders, Location reminders & voice reminders. NEW! Easily create tasks and get reminders in WhatsApp.

‚Ä¢ WORK TOGETHER - Share your to do list and assign tasks with your friends, family & colleagues from your task list to collaborate and get more done. 

---

ALL-IN-ONE PLANNER & CALENDAR APP FOR GETTING THINGS DONE
Create and set reminders with voice to your to do list. 
For better task management flow we added a calendar integration to keep your agenda always up to date. 
For better productivity, we added recurring reminders, location reminders, one-time reminder, sub-tasks, notes & file attachments. 
To keep your to do list up to date, we‚Äôve added a daily planner and focus mode.

INTEGRATIONS
Any.do To do list, Calendar, planner & Reminders Integrates with Google Calendar, Outlook, WhatsApp, Slack, Gmail, Google Tasks, Evernote, Trello, Wunderlist, Todoist, Zapier, Asana, Microsoft to-do, Salesforce, OneNote, Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa, Office 365, Exchange, Jira & More.

TO DO LIST, CALENDAR, PLANNER & REMINDERS MADE SIMPLE
Designed to keep you on top of your to do list, tasks and calendar events with no hassle. With intuitive drag and drop of tasks, swiping to mark to-do's as complete, and shaking your device to remove completed from your to do list - you can stay organized and enjoy every minute of it.

POWERFUL TO DO LIST TASK MANAGEMENT
Add a to do list item straight from your email / Gmail / Outlook inbox by forwarding do@Any.do. Attach files from your computer, Dropbox, or Google Drive to your to- tasks.

DAILY PLANNER & LIFE ORGANIZER
Any.do is a to do list, a calendar, an inbox, a notepad, a checklist, task list, a board for post its or sticky notes, a task & project management tool, a reminder app, a daily planner, a family organizer, an agenda, a bill planner and overall the simplest productivity tool you will ever have. 

SHARE LISTS, ASSIGN & ORGANIZE TASKS
To plan & organize projects has never been easier. Now you can share lists between family members, assign tasks to each other, chat and much more. Any.do will help you and the people around you stay in-sync and get reminders so that you can focus on what matters, knowing you had a productive day and crossed off your to do list.

GROCERY LIST & SHOPPING LIST
Any.do task list, calendar, agenda, reminders & planner is also great for shopping lists at the grocery store. Simply create a list on Any.do, share it with your loved ones and see them adding their shopping items in real-time.

Review and organize your calendar events and to do list side by side.

‚Ä¢ SYNCS SEAMLESSLY - Keeps all your to do list, tasks, reminders, notes, calendar & agenda always in sync so you‚Äôll never forget a thing. Sync your phone‚Äôs calendar, google calendar, Facebook events, outlook calendar or any other calendar so you don‚Äôt forget an important event.

‚Ä¢ SET REMINDERS - One time reminders, recurring reminders, Location reminders & voice reminders. NEW! Easily create tasks and get reminders in WhatsApp.

‚Ä¢ WORK TOGETHER - Share your to do list and assign tasks with your friends, family & colleagues from your task list to collaborate and get more done.

---

ALL-IN-ONE PLANNER & CALENDAR APP FOR GETTING THINGS DONE
Create and set reminders with voice to your to do list.
For better task management flow we added a calendar integration to keep your agenda always up to date.
For better productivity, we added recurring reminders, location reminders, one-time reminder, sub-tasks, notes & file attachments.
To keep your to do list up to date, we‚Äôve added a daily planner and focus mode.

INTEGRATIONS
Any.do To do list, Calendar, planner & Reminders Integrates with Google Calendar, Outlook, WhatsApp, Slack, Gmail, Google Tasks, Evernote, Trello, Wunderlist, Todoist, Zapier, Asana, Microsoft to-do, Salesforce, OneNote, Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa, Office 365, Exchange, Jira & More.

TO DO LIST, CALENDAR, PLANNER & REMINDERS MADE SIMPLE
Designed to keep you on top of your to do list, tasks and calendar events with no hassle. With intuitive drag and drop of tasks, swiping to mark to-do's as complete, and shaking your device to remove completed from your to do list - you can stay organized and enjoy every minute of it.

POWERFUL TO DO LIST TASK MANAGEMENT
Add a to do list item straight from your email / Gmail / Outlook inbox by forwarding do@Any.do. Attach files from your computer, Dropbox, or Google Drive to your to- tasks.

DAILY PLANNER & LIFE ORGANIZER
Any.do is a to do list, a calendar, an inbox, a notepad, a checklist, task list, a board for post its or sticky notes, a task & project management tool, a reminder app, a daily planner, a family organizer, an agenda, a bill planner and overall the simplest productivity tool you will ever have.

SHARE LISTS, ASSIGN & ORGANIZE TASKS
To plan & organize projects has never been easier. Now you can share lists between family members, assign tasks to each other, chat and much more. Any.do will help you and the people around you stay in-sync and get reminders so that you can focus on what matters, knowing you had a productive day and crossed off your to do list.

GROCERY LIST & SHOPPING LIST
Any.do task list, calendar, agenda, reminders & planner is also great for shopping lists at the grocery store. Simply create a list on Any.do, share it with your loved ones and see them adding their shopping items in real-time.

recentChanges:
- Redesigned Any.do Moment
- New app navigation with filters, lists, tags, search and grocery lists

comments: I like the fact that I write down ALL my goals and things that i want to do and i can see all of them, then pick the ones that I want to work on today and the ones I want to work on tomorrow and so on. Also, organizing them into sections is a good feature as well. That way i feel i can see all my new years resolution and the steps that i must take to achieve them and drag and drop this step to do today and that step to do tomorrow.

Many errors, the app is good but sometimes with the recurrent task do not work when I use desktop app it do not sync well and I lose many task and this is unpleasant. Pay for this app with this errors is a bad idea. I do no feel secure with app I lose taks and time. I hope the app get better. And the plan my day would be good if add the tasks in someday

This still works pretty well, but I'm not a fan of the updated widget not listing tasks chronologically. Edit: Nevermind, the sort order can be changed through the app. Thanks to the dev who pointed this out to me. You and your app have been helpful :)

I love this app and use it in preference to my inbuilt calendars because it is so user-friendly and reminders really stand out. It does not seem to have any impact on my overall storage either - getting to be a problem for me. Really useful.

I've removed all my other planner/list/grocery/schedule apps. I used to have so many for different things, but this app has it all! And it's so sleek and simple! I absolutely love it! And I'm looking forward to a free dark theme in the future, it's all I miss!

title: The Sims‚Ñ¢ Mobile
description:
Express your creativity as you customize your Sims‚Äô distinct appearances and unique personalities, giving them traits and having fun with fashion and hairstyles. Effortlessly build your Sims the perfect home, choosing favorite designs and d√©cor, with more detail than ever before on mobile. Experience the rich and entertaining moments of your Sims‚Äô lives as they accomplish career goals, pursue hobbies, develop relationships, and improve their Lifestyle. Party with friends, socialize around town, attend special events, and give Stickers to your favorite Sims. What stories will you tell? 

CREATE UNIQUE SIMS
Customize Sims‚Äô appearances, hairstyles, outfits, makeup, and accessories. From nose to toes, there are endless possibilities! Then put together an unforgettable wardrobe when you team up with Izzy Fabulous in the Fashion Shop. Choose personality traits for each Sim, like Active or Musical, and add more as your Sims gain life experience.

BUILD THE PERFECT HOME
Design your Sims a home where they can experience all that life has to offer. Effortlessly personalize home layouts and designs, selecting from a variety of furniture, appliances, decorations, and even themed collections. Then take your Sims out to discover awesome, customizable venues like a fashion studio, restaurant, and nightclub. 

SHAPE YOUR SIMS‚Äô LIFESTYLE 
Guide the stories of your Sims‚Äô lives from careers and hobbies to relationships and families. Pick exciting careers like Fashion Designer and Doctor, and hobbies like Cooking and Guitar playing. Have friendly and romantic relationships with other Sims and take Risky Actions like trying for a kiss or inventing an experimental recipe. Start a family and create a path for future generations by passing down powerful Heirlooms. 

PLAY TOGETHER
Host and attend parties with other Sims where you can socialize and earn rewards. Show off your amazing house, develop romantic relationships, and even decide to move in with other people‚Äôs Sims. Join special daily events like Speed Dating in the Park or the Market Square Music Festival. Plus, meet other players‚Äô Sims at parties or around town and use Stickers to let them know if they‚Äôre Cute, Hot, or Fabulous!

There are endless ways to connect when you craft big and small moments for your Sims, and see where life takes them in The Sims Mobile!
____________
Important Consumer Information. Some images shown may contain in-app purchases. This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA‚Äôs Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details). Allows players to communicate via the in-game party chat feature. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Google Play Game Services. Log out of Google Play Game Services before installation if you don‚Äôt want to share your game play with friends.

User Agreement: http://terms.ea.com

Privacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.com

Visit http://help.ea.com for assistance or inquiries

EA may retire online features after 30 days' notice posted on www.ea.com/service-updates.

recentChanges:
Sul Sul! Get in the spirit of sorcery with your Sims in our spellbinding Halloween update in The Sims Mobile. You‚Äôll also enjoy:

-We've changed the way your Sims do Actions! You no longer have to wait for the green 'tick', so you can earn rewards faster.

-The ‚ÄòFright Night‚Äô Treasure Hunt event! Discover enchanting rewards filled with witch-inspired attire and magic potions!

-The rerun of Sweet Treat Showdown event ‚ÄòTreatsylvania Haunt‚Äô!

Follow our Twitter for the latest news!
comments: I loved the game at first I even made it to level 50. However, after months of playing the game investing my time and money it rebooted and made me start over from level 1. They took away my home and Sims family. I was so disappointed. They have since fixed this problem and returned my level and items. I love this game.

Ok. I like this game. But one thing that i really don't like is that they don't notify us of new updates in the game. I would have to go to playstore everytime i suspect there's new updates. Sometimes i would have missed more than a week during an event before i update and i miss good products. So I really hope they would change that and notify us within the game. Otherwise i love it.

I love the game but some things are still quite annoying in it, like the challenges, some are impossible to get unless you make use of real money to purchase sim cash. It think they should make the challenges quite easier to win reward becos some people can't always afford that. I am also hoping to see pets and cars in the game. By the way nice one EA and Maxis

Quite good mobile adaptation of The Sims game. Enjoyable. -- Problem though: My Sim is female but Izzy designed male clothes for me on the first try, and still male on the second try. My starter Fashion Gems all wasted since females can't wear male clothes. Suggestions: 1) make Izzy able to detect the current Sim's gender or allow us to choose. 2) State the requirements of player's name so that we don't have to keep guessing why it gets rejected.

Have all sims in collection. All great only complaint in this game is the loading and the none selling of items in storage.Be good if could add more sims. Over all great game. Am enjoying it. If the situations were resolved i would give a 5 stars. cheers..

title: Disney+
description:
Disney+ is the streaming home of your favorite stories. With unlimited entertainment from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars and National Geographic, you‚Äôll never be bored. Watch the latest releases, Original series and movies, classic films, throwback TV shows, and so much more.

Stream and download Original Series like The Mandalorian, and fan favorites like The Simpsons, Marvel‚Äôs The Avengers, and Frozen. There‚Äôs always something new to discover. 

With Disney+, you get:
‚Ä¢ A premium ad-free experience
‚Ä¢ Access to new releases, timeless classics and past seasons of your favorite TV shows 
‚Ä¢ Exclusive new Originals from the creators of Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic
‚Ä¢ GroupWatch, a way to watch Disney+ together, even when you‚Äôre apart
‚Ä¢ Unlimited downloads on up to 10 devices
‚Ä¢ Over 100 titles in 4K UHD and HDR
‚Ä¢ The ability to watch on four screens at once at no extra cost

For help with Disney+, please visit: http://help.disneyplus.com.
For our Subscriber Agreement and other policies please visit: https://disneyplus.com/legal.
