recentChanges: The latest version of Disney+ includes fixes and updates that should make your streaming experience better.
comments: It has everything I want to watch from Disney! I love it sooo much. I had this service since Day 1 and there used to be multiple issues but now it has been a year and it is perfect, no issues whatsoever. I do wish the algorithm for movies recommended to you were on the level that Netflix and Amazon Prime Video has, but I'm sure that will be more finetuned in the future. Overall, I'm very happy with this app and service, and will continue its patronage into the foreseeable future.

Slow. Doesn't load. Says it's my internet but all my other streaming services work great. Hulu, Amazon, Netflix. Wish they would work on that. Also not everything comes up on my watchlist that I have saved. If I manually look for it. It shows in my watchlist but when I go to my watchlist. It isn't there. Downloaded movie to watch on the plane. Didn't work. I like the old Disney movies but not all of them are on here. They say they switch them up but never do.

The app worked great for the first 10 months but over the last month when we're at home watching a movie, the movie will freeze up and then the app will reset. After that, we have to navigate back to the movie. UPDATE.. PLEASE FIX THIS F@UCKING APP! We're paying for a monthly service in which we can't even watch the programing. A corporation like Disney should have a flawless app. The app was perfect and now it sucks.

I love watching my favorite shows on here, but this only works on my laptop and will not work on my phone. I have tried everything to get it to work and the only thing that keeps coming up when I try to watch something is "sorry cannot play if error keeps happening please contact disney support with code 39". But like I said works perfectly fine on my computer. I want to watch it on my phone as well, please fix the problem!

This app is pretty good I have enjoyed it so far. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is the app runs a slow sometimes but that could be on my end so I wouldn't take that into consideration too much. I also like the shows that are on there now but I was watching the marvel movies and they don't have Spiderman or The Hulk which isn't that big of a deal but if you wanted to watch those you would need another app +subscription. Overall its a good app and is cheap compared to other streaming services.

title: Mind map & note taking tool - MindMeister
description:
Whether you're using it for mind mapping, project planning, brainstorming/idea management, note-taking or presentations, MindMeister can help you organize, prioritize, and even generate new ideas. MindMeister lets you share your mind maps with as many friends or colleagues as you want and collaborate with them in real-time.

Designed from the ground up as an extension to our award-winning, browser-based interface, the MindMeister app stores your mobile creations and seamlessly syncs them with your online account.


Feature highlights:
‚úî Create and edit graphical mind maps
‚úî Seamlessly sync maps and folders with your free online account
‚úî Share maps directly from the device
‚úî Multi-touch support for drag & drop, zoom, pan 
‚úî Add icons, colors, styles, boundaries and map themes
‚úî Edit and view notes, links and tasks on ideas
‚úî Draw connections between topics
‚úî Export as RTF
‚úî Manage Favorites
‚úî Play map-based presentations on your device

Additional features for a paid MindMeister account:
‚úî Export as MindManager, Freemind, PDF, image, MS Word and MS PowerPoint
‚úîUnlimited mind maps
‚úîAttach files and images
‚úîPriority Support

Additional features through www.MindMeister.com interface:
‚úî Unlimited undo/redo
‚úî Import from MindManager, Freemind, Mind and text files

What can you use Mind maps for?
‚úî Idea Management
   - Capture, manage and implement ideas
‚úî Brainstorming
   - Visual real-time brainstorming for teams
‚úî Project Planning
   - Design plans together and put them into reality together
‚úî Note Taking
   - Take meaningful and efficient notes
‚úî Knowledge Management
   - Manage the collective intelligence of your team
‚úî Meeting Management
   - Visualize your agenda, take notes, assign tasks to the persons responsible and work together

NOTE: Requires a free account registration. 


Privacy policy: https://www.mindmeister.com/privacy
Terms of use: https://www.mindmeister.com/legal

recentChanges: With this release we have improved the drag and drop functionality and the compatibility with Android 11. We've also fixed some smaller sync issues.
comments: The New Update Messed it all up. I had purchased a plan and it should download PDF of the same like it used to earlier. Now it Just shows PDF in Queue and doesnt download. I loved the app before this. But I had worked alot over the map I had created and Dont want to do it all over again. Please Fo Something!!!!!

Why is everything about money, cant the app be free or at least have 100 free mind maps. Yet you can only use 3 mind maps for free. Total waste of my time. Its a shame because the actual layout and tools are perfect for revision.
Absolute rubbish portrait mode only, can't drag and re-arrange as you choose, no text align options, can't selection multiple cells at once for editing. WASTE OF MONEY
This application helps me a lot. Mind maps make complicated data very organised and clear And this works for me the best.
1. Hard to use; 2. Not for marketing teams; 3. APP version slow working

title: Mood Messenger - SMS & MMS
description:
The best rated alternative to your default Android SMS & MMS App
 Simple, smooth and effective
You can customize almost everything and you have access to awesome features like the typing indicator and real timer caller id.
If you are frustrated by the default Android texting app you must try Mood Messenger

- Bubble shapes & colors
- Backgrounds & over 100 themes
- Fonts & text size

comments: I have used this app for years and loved it. I loved the background themes the most. But since the update, nothing works right. I've been noticing that I'm not getting messages in real time. They come much later and sometimes only if I open the app to check. When I get off a call, which should have nothing to do with the text app, there's a blank text screen on the page with a huge ad at the bottom. I'm looking for a new app. This one no longer suits my style.

The new update is horrible. I try to text and it blacks out my text window so its hard to see. It shoves a ad the size of a third of you screen which tries to get you to accidently hit it, which then erases your current text. Between the ad strip on top and the large banner ads on the bottom this app no longer is fast and easy to use. To slow dodging ads.

Not sure what happened since the last update, but now when i send a message, i get a failed to send error, after the green dots go back and forth for a while. I never get the green check. I have had to go back to my old sms client to keep from getting this error. Back to the same issue after this update.

I used to love this app, but I HATE the new style that came with the most recent update. Now, now matter how small the font is, when you're typing a text it will only allow two to three words on each line and it breaks up long words even though there's plenty of space in the bubble. This makes it really hard to proofread your texts. Also, I can never reply to 5 digit text numbers and the developers have not helped me fix this. Currently looking for a new app.

To walk from, or even past an app like this I couldn't do so. How awesome it definitely is, does remain on five with me. But only do I request one thing; if having either a modified or simply rain-based theme. Alongside the hopes of having a rain theme, I also was going to mention that while typing the texts, why our words don't cover the entire area while doing so now? Could that be fixed as well. Thank you.

title: Microsoft OneDrive
description:
Microsoft OneDrive keeps your photos and files backed up, protected, synced, and accessible on all your devices. This OneDrive app lets you view and share OneDrive files, documents, and photos with friends and family. Plus, you can use the app to automatically back up your phone‚Äôs photos and videos. Start with 5 GB of free cloud storage or upgrade to a Microsoft 365 subscription to get 1 TB of storage.

Microsoft OneDrive offers the following features:

Back up photos & videos
‚Ä¢ Automatic photo backup when you turn on Camera Upload
‚Ä¢ Find photos easily thanks to automatic tagging
‚Ä¢ View photos on your phone, computer, and online

File sharing and access
‚Ä¢ Share files, photos, videos, and albums with friends and family
‚Ä¢ Get notifications when a shared document is edited
‚Ä¢ Set password-protected or expiring sharing links*
‚Ä¢ Access selected OneDrive files on the app without being online

Document Scanning
‚Ä¢ Scan, sign, and send docs right from the OneDrive mobile app
‚Ä¢ Scan and markup docs, receipts, whiteboards, and more

Search
‚Ä¢ Search photos by what‚Äôs in them (i.e. beach, snow, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Search docs by name or content

Security
‚Ä¢ All OneDrive files are encrypted at rest and in transit
‚Ä¢ Personal Vault lets you protect your important files with identity verification
‚Ä¢ Restore files with version history
‚Ä¢ Stay protected with ransomware detection & recovery*

Works with Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Outlook
‚Ä¢  Use Microsoft Office apps to edit and collaborate in real time on Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneNote files stored in OneDrive.
‚Ä¢  Back up, view, and save your Office documents.

The OneDrive app for Android offers 5 GB of free cloud storage to sync photos and files across your devices, share photos and docs, and keep your digital life backed up in the cloud.

Upgrade to a Microsoft 365 subscription
With a Microsoft 365 Personal subscription you get 1TB of storage (1TB of storage per person for up to 6 people with the Family subscription), OneDrive premium features, and access to all features in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and OneNote on mobiles devices, web browsers, PCs and Macs. 

To make an in-app purchase of a Microsoft 365 Personal or Family subscription: open the app, tap the Me tab, then tap your storage or the diamond icon. Subscriptions begin at $6.99 a month in the US, and can vary by region. Microsoft 365 subscriptions and OneDrive standalone subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Google Play store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. 

To manage your subscriptions or to disable auto-renewal, after purchase, go to your Google Play store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled or refunded during the active subscription period.

Using this OneDrive app for work or school
For you to sign into your work or school account on OneDrive, your organization needs to have a qualifying OneDrive, SharePoint Online or Microsoft 365 business subscription plan. 
 
Privacy
This app is provided by Microsoft. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or its affiliates maintain facilities. 
 
Privacy Policy: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=507539 
Terms of Use: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246338 

*Requires Microsoft 365 Personal or Family subscription

recentChanges: You can now set up OneDrive to unlock with your face, if your device supports it.
comments: This is a frustrating app. On one hand, on one of my devices, this app is great. It runs properly, is decently clear on what everything does, and having the peace of mind that my photos are safe is nice. On the other hand, on another device, this app crashes every time I try to move photos to a different app, is slow when doing anything else, and ends up wasting my time.

So far I am LOVING THIS!!! I have only just begun using OneDrive, not knowing entirely what it was to begin with. Now I look for it wherever I am. I can open ANY file from pretty much ANY device! Word, power point, excel, etc.! I find that impressive. Especially since it's Microsoft. Like, I think Google tried to do the same thing but something just doesn't feel right over there. This is where it's at. Hands down. So far I highly recommend.

I don't understand what's happend with this app. It worked perfectly fine and then Samsung backup switched to using one drive and it just isn't uploading anything right, it's not uploaded and new pictures from the last month since it change apart from some pictures from a year ago. Then it's saying it can no longer back up from and SD card? There doesn't appear to be anyway to change back and it's not clear what I actually have backed up now. So disappointed.

Setup trying, should be made easier. Sometimes it takes days for uploads. Amazon is good for auto uploads. Making sub- albums is nonexistent (I used to keep info on leases, rent receipts, complaints, etc. in separate albums then group them under 1 album). Even Google changed that capability. I can't deal with these egomaniacs deciding what to do with my pics.

Works ok except one annoying issue. The file dates displayed appear to be the dates the file was initially created and not the date the file was modified/synced. You cannot tell if file is modified until you open and inspect it. This problem is unique to Android version. Works correctly on all other OneDrive apps on other platforms (IOS, Windows, etc).

title: Norton Mobile Security - Antivirus & Anti-Malware
description:
Norton Mobile Security & Antivirus is an award winning mobile [4] phone security service and virus protection app. This virus detector and remover for androids helps protect your devices against malware, viruses and threats such as malicious apps, theft, and websites designed to steal your information and money. Norton has years of experience in providing anti virus protection for your PC and now it is a trusted name in mobile phone security apps.

Android Security Features (including 30-Day Trial [1])

---------------------------------------------

Did you know that 75% of mobile apps fail basic security tests?
(Gartner report, 2014)

‚òÖ App Advisor powered by Norton‚Ñ¢ Mobile Insight, automatically checks apps for potential privacy risks, high battery and data usage or intrusive behavior before download. [3]

‚òÖ Android Antivirus: A malware scanner that helps to remove apps that have malware, spyware, or an Android virus that can harm or slow your device. Proactive virus detector, virus cleaner and antivirus protection.[3]

‚òÖ WiFi Security helps your device stay safe when connecting to public Wi-Fi. Wi-Fi Security alerts if an unknown party on the same Wi-Fi network is spying on your online activity, known as a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks.

‚òÖ Surveillance App Protection helps protect your online privacy and security by letting you know if an app is sharing your device‚Äôs location, contacts, photos, and messages without your authorization.

‚òÖ Privacy Report Interactive Map shows where in the world apps send personal information and photos



---------------------------------------------

Another trusted app from Norton. Norton Security & Antivirus provides proactive anti-malware, spyware and antivirus protection. This virus detector and remover will ensure that your phone security is as tight as it can be.

comments: Look. It works and is effective. However. For the sake of going in educated, know that if you don't know how to unsubscribe via Google Play, Norton is going to make finding out a bad time. They deliberately force you to make an account, force you to share details to contact support, and deliberately provide no information on how to unsubscribe from the service. That type of behavior says a LOT about the ethics of a company. Be aware before making a commitment.

I mainly got this Norton app for the excellent call blocking features... everything else was just a plus. Now, a message on the app indicates the call blocking feature will be discontinued in a future update so that Norton can add some "exciting new features." Nothing could be exciting enough without being able to block calls! I'll finish out the year I paid for and then move to something else....for free!

I have never had the real time fraud and spam call alerts since I've installed the Norton 360 app, I wish it would block telemarketers and robocalls, not only in the calling but also in the messaging. I'm forever getting calls from what I know I've reported to the blocking app, which I have to manually put in the blocking app. I love the safe search feature, I love the play store features that works you of an unsafe app before you download it. I love so far the identity safe features also.

Perfect Mix of Mobile Security & Antivirus Combo For Galaxy Note 4 Running On Android 6.0.1 Everything seems to run well with no issues. I think I'll stick with this current updated version 4.8.0 on my phone since updating to much further might start to have a negative effects on my old operating system. Keep up the good work.üëà

LOUSY! VPN constantly has to be logged into over & over ... AND the app doesn't recognize login info so you are returned to the login screen. The antivirus can be running at the same time but the VPN is a separate app. Very poor design. Added 10/29/20 - just rec'd notice Norton is removing Call Block feature. RUFKM?? That's one of the MOST important features!! Time to find a BETTER security app. Sorry Norton. Your app is not worth the cost anymore.

comments: well since this is a Moto phone from Motorola that says it all right there for a mid-range phone that has all the bells and whistles to die and it wants to and that camera works excellent a lot of stuff in there and they got some hidden features that are pretty cool too A lot of the other phones don't have so hey check it out I think you'll like it

Awesome app !! It fixes all the problems and also notifies me before doing so. It immaculately cleans all the cache , and has an option to select which files to delete, which if not present would create a lot of problem. It also checks before deleting.Clears trash very fast. Love this app üòª

Ever since I did the updated to Android 10 things have gotten worse. Camera does not accept micro usb, cameral will not save pictures and had deleted pictures on SD card without warning, apps have been slow or icons show they are there and they deleted by the update etc..Not happy at all.

It goes to fast to understand and follow, before you can respond. Then it automatically makes its own decisions. It screwef my phone up, turned my volume down and changed my screen colors. It doesn't allow a 0 star rating.

title: BAND - App for all groups
description:
Organize your group on BAND! It‚Äôs the perfect group communication app, with features like the Community Board, Shared Calendar, Polls, To-Do Lists, Private Chat & much more!


BAND is BEST for:

‚óè Sports Teams ‚Äì Keep track of game days and team practices with the Calendar, send quick notifications about canceled practices, and share team videos and photos, all in one place.

‚óè Work/Projects - Share files and keep everyone in the loop with the community board. Have a quick group call with remote teams. Hold everyone accountable with shared to-do lists.

‚óè School Groups - Plan all your school events easily with the group Calendar. Use Polls to plan activities and food options. Send group messages to keep everyone updated.

‚óè Faith Groups - Organize activities with weekly notices and event RSVPs. Support each other throughout the week by privately sharing prayer requests through chat.

‚óè Gaming Clans and Guilds - Set up a raiding schedule with the group calendar and share important information about any game with all your members. Use multiple chat rooms to find groups, manage recruitment and share strategies.

‚óè Family, Friends, Communities - Stay connected with your family and friends. BAND also has Public groups! Use the Discover feature to find communities with similar interests.


Why BAND?

BAND is the best way to stay connected with your group! BAND is trusted by group leaders as the Official Team Communication App for Varsity Spirit, AYSO,¬†USBands,¬†and Legacy Global Sports.

‚óè Be social & stay organized in the same place
Community Board / Calendar / Poll / Group File Sharing / Photo Album / Private Chat / Group Call

‚óè Create or join a space that meets your group‚Äôs unique needs
Adjust privacy settings (secret, closed, public), control notifications, manage members (admin & co-admins), assign privileges, and make a vanity URL or home cover design dedicated to your group. Customize your group and use it how you want to!

‚óè Accessibility
You can chat wherever you are. BAND can be used on any device including your phone, desktop, or tablet by going to¬†http://band.us.
We value your feedback! Send us your feedback and/or suggestions so we can make BAND better for you & your groups.

recentChanges:
Set a GIF as your profile photo!

Create a file folder and upload files to it

In "Attachments," search attachments by title/creator/date

comments: Band has been fantastic! I've been using it for the last 3 years since I became cheer director for our local youth league. It keeps me organized and everything in one spot. Its so helpful with parents. You can add everyone to your band and set things how you want them. They even have a live streaming option, polls, attendance and sooo much more. I will always use band for any group stuff I may have.

I love the original Band App. It works so well from. My team at work and our daughters softball team to communicate with the parents. I recently downloaded the BAND FOR KIDS for my daughter to talk to her teammates, it hasn't worked yet. I have paid 2 different times, $.50 and I still can't make it work.

Great app--has essentially transformed our group's communication. Feature request: Please allow toggling the visibility of calendars within a Band. If we have multiple calendars created for different purposes, it would be nice to be able to declutter the agenda view by hiding events from irrelevant calendars. Also, please let us specify an individual calendar (when there are multiple) from a specific band when we are creating a widget. Thank you, developers!

This is a excellent app. I was able to listen enjoy and be a part of a church service that was active. Thank you Pastor Rodrick Reeve of New Creation family worship center. Also the staff and congregation. Love the way it works. I will tell others how good it is. Thanks.ü§©

Perhaps the best application to manage a sports team activities and keep everyone coordinated and on the same page. Same is true for the recording project, as it is a platform to have all the materials shared and updated between the participants.

title: HomeoCare
description:
HomeoCare is complete solution for all kind of disease.HomeoCare application is used to display information of all kind of disease to all users free of cost. This application also provides add to your favorite list facility for all disease for future use. 

Each disease contains four types information like

1) Symptoms
2) Treatment
3) Disease Type
4) Causes

title: Deezer Music Player: Songs, Playlists & Podcasts
description:
Your life deserves its own soundtrack. With 56 million tracks, playlists and podcasts plus personalized recommendations just for you, Deezer is your music companion. This music player for Android will always give you the songs you love, and help you discover your next favorites. You bring the passion, we bring the music.

Enjoy best-in-class features with the Deezer song and playlist app 

‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Stream all the global hits 
‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Browse an ever-expanding catalog with 56 million songs 
‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Lean back and find new tracks with Shuffle Mode 
‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Get recommendations made for you and explore music in a new way with Flow 
‚Ä¢ Add songs you love to your Favorite Tracks collection with one tap
‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Listen to any playlist you want or become a playlist maker yourself
‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Share your personal playlists and favorite tracks with others 
‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Discover radio stations, audio channels, and podcasts in English


Want the full experience? Go limitless with Deezer Premium music player - no ads and no wifi needed

‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Music player with no ads
‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Offline Mode: download your favorite tracks or podcasts and listen to offline music anywhere
‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips 
‚Ä®‚Ä¢ No song shuffling 
‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Superior Sound Quality (320 kBps) 
‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Music and podcast player is compatible with Amazon Alexa, Google Home and other connected devices 


Deezer Flow

Tell the Flow music player what you like, and it will create the perfect music mix for you based on your tastes, helping you discover new tracks and artists along the way. Just press play, and enjoy a non-stop music stream with all the songs you love - plus your next favorites 


Compatible devices

Enjoy Deezer with your connected devices - listen to your favorite pop songs and playlists on Google Home, Amazon Alexa, and Sonos sound systems. 


Deezer Family: 
Up to 6 Deezer Premium profiles on one account, so you can share the love of music with the whole family. 

Deezer Student: 
All the benefits of Deezer Premium such as listening to offline music, but for half the price.

Deezer Hi-Fi:  
Stream music in lossless quality on high-res sound systems.

Privacy policy: http://www.deezer.com/legal/personal-datas.php 
Terms of use: http://www.deezer.com/legal/cgu.php

The Deezer music player offers unlimited access to the hottest songs and podcasts. Find playlists that give a soundtrack to every moment or create your own. No wifi needed - download songs and enjoy offline music, perfect for when you‚Äôre at home or on the go. Discover more of what you love - including inspiring podcasts for free

recentChanges: We've put our app in order. Less bugs so your app works like a charm.
comments: It's alright. I switched to Deezer to try it out and although I'm not hating it, I'm not loving it either. The most annoying thing so far that I've came across is the queue list. I do not understand why when I add a song to queue, it adds it to the bottom of an already preloaded list? It's really annoying. If I'm adding songs to queue, I want to listen to those songs after the current one finishes not random 20 songs that Deezer has decided to put in there before my ones. Edit: I do have Premium

The music reccomendation and mixes are absolutely awful. The "Flow" mix keeps repeating the same songs instead of letting me explore music. But the worst part is the network issues - there were so many times the songs just wouldn't load (while other apps work just fine so its not my network thats the issue). In my opinion Deezer is just a low-quality Spotify imitation.

Rated 2 because I use the download functionality to be able to have local copies of songs due to poor mobile reception around where I live. However, even though songs are downloaded, deezer won't load the downloaded playlist with poor mobile reception, so the functionality is useless to me. Means everytime I open the app and go to play songs I can't until I get reception again. Spotify, and apple music both work correctly, so switching back. Edit in response to reply: not device related

Good selection, but hard to navigate to music you can "download", which you actually can not download to your device at all, even as a premium subscriber. If I pay for premium service, I should be able to download music to my device (I wouldn't have a problem with the download self deleting every so often), so I can play through my own music player. I can not play through my Kenwood Weblink, or my Pioneer Weblink, for display purposes, or to overlay my Navigation System. If so would rate 5 star

This is my 4th review, after this I am not gonna pay for this app. As I am writing this my eyes are about to close and Deezer has still been able to load my playlist (as usual) and when it does most of my songs are skipping like a broken disc, the development team isn't seem to be doing any fixes. I used to love this app but it's getting too annoying now. This app is too unresponsive and I use a s10 and it's also the same thing on my dad's s20.

title: Babbel - Learn Languages - Spanish, French & More
description:
Millions of people learn languages with Babbel ‚Äî the app built by language learning experts. Our short, interactive lessons rethink old-school language education to get you speaking a new language in 2020 with confidence.

LEARN SPANISH OR 13 OTHER LANGUAGES

We're not just a Spanish learning app! Want to learn French, learn German or speak Italian like a local? With so many languages to choose from, it‚Äôs up to you!

Spanish üá™üá∏üá≤üáΩ | French üá´üá∑ | Italian üáÆüáπ | German üá©üá™ | Portuguese üáßüá∑ | Russian üá∑üá∫ | Polish üáµüá± | 
Turkish üáπüá∑ | Norwegian üá≥üá¥ | Danish üá©üá∞ | Swedish üá∏üá™ | Dutch üá≥üá± | Indonesian üáÆüá© | English üá¨üáßüá∫üá∏

Babbel is great for beginners but even experienced learners have proven to advance their conversation skills!*

======

BABBEL WORKS!
‚òÖ Effectiveness backed by researchers at Yale University:
100% of study participants improved their oral proficiency in 3 months*

96% of learners saw better test scores on grammar and vocabulary**

‚òÖ PCMagazine says the Babbel language app ‚Äúexceeds expectations‚Äù 

======

Babbel is the best language-learning app.

Our language learning experts build every course tailored to your native language. So whether you want to learn Spanish, learn Italian or learn French ‚Äî or even German, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Dutch, Indonesian or English ‚Äî you‚Äôll learn quickly and effectively.

BITE-SIZE, INTERACTIVE LESSONS - Easily fit language learning into your busy schedule with lessons that take only 10-15 minutes to complete (some Spanish lessons are even shorter).

LANGUAGES FOR ANY SITUATION - Find language lessons for travel, work, everyday life and much, much more

LISTEN, SPEAK, READ, WRITE - Practice all the elements of language learning and start speaking real-life conversations 

IMPROVE YOUR PRONUNCIATION - Babbel‚Äôs speech recognition technology helps you sound like a native speaker

REMEMBER WHAT YOU LEARN -  Use the review feature so the previous lessons stick, and understand grammar (including Spanish conjugation)

LEARN LANGUAGES IN CONTEXT - Enhance your language learning with tips & tricks that guide you throughout lessons

OVER 6,000 LANGUAGE COURSES - Learn Spanish and 13 other languages with in-depth content, including more than 60,000 language lessons

With Babbel, you‚Äôll be on your way to mastering the ultimate goal of language learning ‚Äî having real-life conversations with confidence. Whether you need a Spanish learning app or a French learning app, you‚Äôve always wanted to learn Italian, you‚Äôre looking to dive into German language learning or improve your English, Babbel is the choice of millions of people looking to enhance their language education.

Make learning a habit. Go beyond language 101 and you'll learn Spanish (or another language!) that you can use to talk in real-life situations.

======

Subscriptions:

You‚Äôll need a subscription to use Babbel fully. Your subscription will be renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period.

DOWNLOAD BABBEL AND TRY FOR FREE ‚Äì Your first lesson is on us. Babbel is completely ad-free.

Privacy policy: https://about.babbel.com/en/privacy/
Terms of use: https://about.babbel.com/en/terms/

Not a native speaker but want to talk just like one? Download Babbel and improve your German language learning, learn English or discover how to speak Spanish. Take your language education to new levels ‚Äî learn French, Italian, English, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Dutch, or Indonesian.

Contact us:
Questions, comments or feedback about language learning with Babbel? Email us at support-mobile@babbel.com.

*Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Available at http://bit.ly/BabbelYale.

**Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Available: http://bit.ly/BabbelMSU.

comments: So over all it is a very good learning experience. The courses are planned wel and it seems that the developers put a large amount of work into this. But as a subscription app that is not that cheap. I has some very frustrating bugs. In the Dutch course you don't have the char ' that is very important for spelling and there is no way around it. And the speaking practice is really bad sometimes that I have gave up using it in the last 2 months. Without those few bugs I would give it 5/5

I had a weird issue to where it wouldn't let me log in saying "Try again later". I uninstalled the app and reinstalled it, it seems to have done the trick. I hope this isn't a recurring issue with the app apart from the voice recognition that others were talking about. It's kind of funny what it thinks you say. It thought I said "Skin store" instead of "Stimmt so". I'll use the other options of reviewing German until voice recognition is fixed. Others should do the same to save any frustration.

This is an awsome app! You are able to learn any language, and you are able to choose if you wanna talk or not, it also tells you if tou should start learning again, or when another level is unlocked! Again like I said the best app ever, I have learned both Spanish and French with this app!

FIXED!!! App doesn't sync lessons completed on the browser. The app itself is great and I've already learnt a lot more in a short time in comparison to other apps because Babbel mixes different topics so it's not boring. That was the thing that slowed my progress before. This app has realistic conversations so you get used to actual language, not just repeating isolated phrases like "Brot und Wasser" twenty times like a drill exercise.

Great app but the lessons are too long and sometimes have 2 halves that are seemingly unrelated. Today I learned about trying on clothes and numbers by the hundred. If these had been 2 seperate lessons in the same course, I wouldn't have minded. But it takes so long to do them at the same time and I can't save my progress. Please either split up the lessons or add an ability to save position in a lesson

title: AutoRap by Smule ‚Äì Make Raps on Cool Beats
description:
With AutoRap you always have a platform to share your raps and rhymes. Duplicate your favorite rap album with your voice or use top beats to make something all your own. Choose from over 5000+ free beats by top artists like Cardi B, Post Malone, Drake, Eminem and Dr.Dre, our own AutoRap "Originals" or numerous community uploaded beats by other rappers and producers. Share your raps with friends, build your audience, and enjoy competing with creators just like you. New to making raps? Start with the proprietary ‚ÄòTalk Mode‚Äô feature and play around as you build the confidence to make a full rap flow. Write lyrics into the app to keep track of your songs and prepare for your next AutoRap battle with a fellow creator. 

Create unique raps in just a few taps
Create a rap track in just a few easy steps. Just choose your beat and go for it ‚Äì AutoRap provides high-quality audio for your recordings and make them sound smooth and polished.

Try Talk Mode for instant pitch-correction fun
Just speak into your phone‚Äôs microphone and listen as AutoRap morphs your speech into a unique rap with pitch-correction and a beat-matching flow.

Practice and improve your flow with a variety of beats
Choose from a large library of instrumental beats‚Äî from all-time classics to the latest and hottest hip hop & RnB hits. Or check out something totally unique from community uploaded beats. We add new beats to the songbook 3 times per week so there‚Äôs always something new to try out.

Meet and compete against other rappers
Rapping doesn‚Äôt have to be solo. Join the AutoRap community and get inspired by other creators with the same passion. Share your raps, meet new people, and make a name for yourself with every rhyme. Take on challenges from other rappers or create one of your own. Once you complete a challenge, Autorap blends the rap-offs into a single track for a direct comparison of your unique styles. 

Bring your own beats to create original rhymes
Have an original beat of your own? Upload it to AutoRap to seamlessly lay your verses on top. You can even encourage other rappers from the community to try it out and create something with your beat. Hundreds of other producers are already on the app collaborating on new beats.  

Share your raps and grow your audience
Rap your truth and share what matters to you. Whether you have a lot to say or don‚Äôt know where to begin, your story matters. Share your recordings on social so your friends can see and support your rhymes. Invite others to join and try a new way to create and have fun. 

Features
FREE Beats and Instrumentals: Choose from over 5000+ beats from top artists, AutoRap Originals and community producers.
Talk Mode: Instantly turn your words into an pitch-correction rap song
Rap Mode: Practice and improve your freestyle verses and rhymes
Rap Battles: Show off your skills and compete with your peers in the community
Lenses: Level up your rap recordings with audio and video effects made for self-expression
Bring Beats: Upload your own beat or explore what others have created
Leaderboards: See top tracks from the community and grow your following through contests and challenges

descriptionHTML:
With AutoRap you always have a platform to share your raps and rhymes. Duplicate your favorite rap album with your voice or use top beats to make something all your own. Choose from over 5000+ free beats by top artists like Cardi B, Post Malone, Drake, Eminem and Dr.Dre, our own AutoRap "Originals" or numerous community uploaded beats by other rappers and producers. Share your raps with friends, build your audience, and enjoy competing with creators just like you. New to making raps? Start with the proprietary ‚ÄòTalk Mode‚Äô feature and play around as you build the confidence to make a full rap flow. Write lyrics into the app to keep track of your songs and prepare for your next AutoRap battle with a fellow creator.

Create unique raps in just a few taps
Create a rap track in just a few easy steps. Just choose your beat and go for it ‚Äì AutoRap provides high-quality audio for your recordings and make them sound smooth and polished.

Try Talk Mode for instant pitch-correction fun
Just speak into your phone‚Äôs microphone and listen as AutoRap morphs your speech into a unique rap with pitch-correction and a beat-matching flow.

Practice and improve your flow with a variety of beats
Choose from a large library of instrumental beats‚Äî from all-time classics to the latest and hottest hip hop & RnB hits. Or check out something totally unique from community uploaded beats. We add new beats to the songbook 3 times per week so there‚Äôs always something new to try out.

Meet and compete against other rappers
Rapping doesn‚Äôt have to be solo. Join the AutoRap community and get inspired by other creators with the same passion. Share your raps, meet new people, and make a name for yourself with every rhyme. Take on challenges from other rappers or create one of your own. Once you complete a challenge, Autorap blends the rap-offs into a single track for a direct comparison of your unique styles.

Bring your own beats to create original rhymes
Have an original beat of your own? Upload it to AutoRap to seamlessly lay your verses on top. You can even encourage other rappers from the community to try it out and create something with your beat. Hundreds of other producers are already on the app collaborating on new beats.

Share your raps and grow your audience
Rap your truth and share what matters to you. Whether you have a lot to say or don‚Äôt know where to begin, your story matters. Share your recordings on social so your friends can see and support your rhymes. Invite others to join and try a new way to create and have fun.

Features
FREE Beats and Instrumentals: Choose from over 5000+ beats from top artists, AutoRap Originals and community producers.
Talk Mode: Instantly turn your words into an pitch-correction rap song
Rap Mode: Practice and improve your freestyle verses and rhymes

comments: Disapointing is what this app is. I had it on my phone a few years ago and i decided to open my old phone and look at the app it was really fun going through all the old stuff i made. That was a few hours ago ive come back and now some of the songs i made are gone (i think the app updated) which is really disapointing because i really liked some of those if you could get the songs i lost back then my rating will change to 5 stars

This app has alot of cool updates but I can't do any of the songs. It says it can't play. But 1 day I used the app. And it finally work!!! But when I save the song I sang on rap mode. I can't even hear my voice singing the vibe. it kind of sucks. So I give it a review
Worst app ever ! It doesnt even record my voice and says everytime that app needs more of your voice to give better results.
This app has seriously improved in the past couple of years, I'm impressed.
The clarity of the recorded voice is not clear like it used to be.

title: MedNotesTP
description:
The app tracks the Injection Sites for Copaxone users. It could be used by people on Avonex, Rebif or other injectable medications like Insulin. This app could be beneficial to people with Multiple Sclerosis ( MS ), with Diabetes or other medical conditions. You can enter a quick note associated with an injection, add an audio note, add a photo or just create a note to track your symptoms or any other medical events. 

Touch the Menu key to add a note. The app will automatically save the notes and the injection site when you go back to the main screen.  If you need to make a note of an event that happened in the past, you can set a date, which would be a new date for the record.  If the date is not set manually, it would be set automatically as a current date on the Mobil device.

Features include:
* Track injection sites
* Text Note/Journal entries
* Photo notes
* Audio notes
* Export text Notes into a pipe delimited file.

Some content is now available in Russian, French and German. Translated using Google Translate.

summary: The app helps to keep track of medical Injection Sites.
recentChanges:
This app was created for a family member and as a courtesy provided for free to android users.
It's not for everyone. It's different from the solutions provided by the drug companies and it takes some time to get use to. If you're not happy with something, please email me before you post a bad comment.

V 4.28
- Some content is now available in German (Thanks Nico)

V 4.27
Place of the injection shot will be displayed in the main list for each of the note
comments: Useful app for taking injection sites, especially if you're trying to document injection site reactions. Would be useful if you could change the date format (I live in the UK), and also I'd you could add multiple pictures to each entry - for instance to track how an injection site has reacted over a period of several days.

It's very easy to use once you realise that there are no bells and whistles to figure out. I thought it would be more complicated which ironically stumped me at first. The instructions could be improved.

Thank you so much for this app. I just started using it because the Copaxone itracker app became completely useless. This tracks what I need without making me want to throw my phone across the room every single night.
The drug company app got too complicated. This works and does the trick. Thinking hard about upgrading to paid verion to get reminders.
Whatca fantastic app. I use it with my ms copaxone injections.

title: Samsung Members v1
description:
We've moved apps!
 
We upgraded to a brand new App! In order to access Samsung Community, 24/7 Care, perks and benefits, go to our new Samsung Members app. We're making it easy for you to switch over. For new users, search for Samsung Members, find our blue icon, download and enjoy!

summary: We've moved apps! Search for "Samsung Members" with the blue icon.
recentChanges: We upgraded to a brand new App, and we're making it easy for you to switch over!
comments: The Samsung A10e is junk. Avoid it. We bought two new phones from our service provider. Neither has ever worked correctly. We've contacted our provider with the problems, only to find we're far from alone! All casual signs point to shoddy processors. Poor reception, incorrect readings showing on screen. Just plain crappy junk. Not worth it!

So I am at this very moment doing an upgrade for this app. When I am doing that I am reading the reviews ( kinda backwards I know) Well every review I have read is saying "run away from these problems " how it is working terrible and even that it cant be uninstalled. I am very nervous and wondering. What did I get my self into?

I'm giving five stars because on all my other phones I've had it works great. But, for some reason this phone the Samsung A01 it asks me to upgrade then tells me it's not compatible, why is this? It's a Samsung Galaxy phone.

This is the phone from hell. Constant error messages so I can't open any unless manage to sneak it in . Now the sound has disappeared unless I put it on speaker phone. This phone was a waist on money just like all the Samsung products I have bought. I am in the hospital and need a phone.
Phone never gets to 100%. Best is 89%. Very frustrating. Other than that it is a good phone. Does more than I ever use it for, though.

comments: I understand that the refund is under process and will probably take 14 days to reflect into my account. I will wait for 14 days and check with the bank. However, I would like to feedback that there is no option to choose for wish cash for the pay later option. It would be more convenient for this function to be available. And also, the refund details only state the full purchase to be refunded and not the 1st installment that was actually paid. Kindly update that into the order details. Thank y

May be easy to use and some prices are great! But some charges are hidden and when they say they can't use your card as payment but end up charging you a fee for services they cannot provide this turned me off and is beyond wrong! If I'm paying for something I expect something and I don't pay for something with no product. I ordered a few times but after I was charged for services not rendered I will not order from wish again!!! I don't pay for nothing and I pray you won't either!!!

This app is getting better and better but the pickup nearby system is in need of much improvement! If you forget to pick something up on the exact date or something happens which makes you unable to pick it up on that date you get a partial refund and no product because the store doesn't know what's in the packages and can't scan it for you anymore! So the store is left with products they can't deliver and the costumer has to reorder the product or is simply left empty handed. CS is sh*'t too..

Updated "blitz buy" is BROKEN. I don't know what they did, but the new Blitz Buy is constantly crashing and not working.... Maybe y'all can call it "glitch buy" because it glitches more than it actually works. Other than that, I've found some unique gifts and good prices. You just have to watch the cost of shipping in order to decide whether the price is "good" or not.

Love everything except that the promos they offer always sound better than they are. It's always like "save up to 90%" but then it's only 5% off. Also the shipping is worded in a way that makes it sound like it's going to be quicker than it is. BUT the prices are low low and the product selection is HUGE!! so the issues are not too important. I love wish!

title: Care Diary
description:
Care Diary is an ad-free, award-winning pill reminder and medication tracker. But Care Diary is more than a free medication reminder: Combining a pill tracker, mood tracker and a health journal, e.g. with a weight tracker, this medication reminder app allows you and your doctor to put your treatment‚Äôs success into perspective. ‚è∞ üíäüîî

üíäKey Features 
‚Ä¢ Pill reminder app for all medications
‚Ä¢ Pill tracker with logbook for skipped and confirmed intakes
‚Ä¢ Support for wide range of dosing schemes within medication reminder
‚Ä¢ Track your tablets, dose, measurements, activities as a comprehensive health journal
‚Ä¢ Family sharing
‚Ä¢ Share your printable health journal with your doctor
‚Ä¢ Wide range of measurements for all conditions (diabetes, rheumatoid arthritis, anxiety, depression, hypertension, multiple sclerosis) e.g. weight, blood pressure, blood sugar levels

‚è∞Comprehensive meds reminder 
We designed a medicine reminder app that puts all your medication needs in one place: Pill reminders (e.g. for birth control pills), a comprehensive database of OTC and Rx medications, support for any dosage form (tablet, pill, inhalation, ‚Ä¶) frequency, and even refill reminders. And as the app is not only a pill alarm, but also a medication tracker, you just need to check its pill diary to make sure you‚Äôve taken that important dose. 

üíäA health tracker for your needs 
Care Diary is the result of us closely working with people taking medications. People with diabetes use the built-in weight tracker and keep track of their blood glucose. Also, they use it as logbook for insulin and a medication reminder for Metformin etc. The built-in mood tracker supports you to keep track of your mental health or depression. Review your health using the blood pressure log, your mood diary or other aspects of your health journal. Care Diary can be a different app to many, with some using it as depression app while others refer to it as stroke app, cancer app, or weight tracker.

‚è∞A tracker for mood, weight, blood pressure and more 
You can not only log your meds, but also track your mood and general well-being in the app‚Äôs mood diary. Record measurements e.g. blood pressure and weight. If you are living with diabetes and are on Insulin, you can use Care Diary as diabetes logbook and track blood glucose. Overall, Care Diary supports ~50 measurements. The app‚Äôs symptom tracker is popular e.g. with users living with multiple sclerosis, rheumatoid arthritis or cardiovascular diseases such as Atrial Fibrillation.

üíäMotivation to take your meds
Receive a beautiful picture of the day as motivation to take your medicine. Involve family and friends with Care Diary Team and successfully manage together. And you can even have your family see if you‚Äôve missed a med despite the pill reminder, so they can help you stay on track.
Care Diary is for you, no matter if you are taking antibiotic medicines or deal with hypertension, atrial fibrillation, diabetes, rheumatoid arthritis, multiple sclerosis, anxiety or depression that are often complicated. Care Diary is medication tracker and health journal. Have peace of mind from medicine reminders and health tracker.

üîíPrivacy
Care Diary is available for free and no registration is required! We comply with strict European privacy laws and do not release personal data to third parties. 

üîéResearch
It‚Äôs the collaborative efforts from users, their families and medical experts that makes our pill tracker app so simple. Check out our academic research partners on our homepage.

title: RareGuru: Rare Disease Patient & Caregiver Support
description:
If you‚Äôre suffering from a rare disease or chronic illness or caring for someone who is, you‚Äôre not alone. Connect with other patients and caregivers, learn about your condition, find health data, and share your story on RareGuru.

RareGuru is a free mobile app that matches caregivers, parents, and patients with similar rare diseases or symptoms. Take back control of your health and future by finding the resources and the social health group you need to thrive.

Connect with knowledgeable and motivated patients and caregivers like you. Track your symptoms, share your diagnosis, learn more about your disease, and help others through their healing process.

Get support from people who share your disease. Find and show support for chronic diseases, depression, symptoms, and more with a network of patients and caregivers.

Share as much or as little about yourself and your condition as you‚Äôd like. Whether you have a chronic disease, newly identified disease or mental disease, what you share with whom is your decision.

Don‚Äôt let your disease isolate you from the world. Connect and learn together with RareGuru.

RareGuru Features:

Connect and share with safe and secure social networking.
Create a private or public profile sharing only the information you‚Äôre comfortable with. RareGuru matches you with other users who share a similar diagnosis or symptoms, and you can filter your matches based on location, age, gender, and user type. Connect only with the users you select and message them through private or group chats. 

Multiple User Types. Many rare diseases are genetic, and several family members may have the same disease. Users can select to be a patient, caregiver, or both.

Rare Disease Database
RareGuru‚Äôs disease database contains 7,000 rare diseases and chronic illnesses and more than 21,000 symptoms. The disease database is regularly updated based on data from the United States Genetic and Rare Disease Information Center (GARD). Users who have a rare diagnosis that is not in the disease database earn a unicorn icon to indicate the rarity.

Symptom Tracker
Track symptoms and take notes to evaluate your condition. You can export data trends for sharing with doctors and specialists.

Rare Disease and Chronic Illness Database
RareGuru‚Äôs disease database contains up to 7,000 rare diseases and chronic conditions and more than 21,000 symptoms. The disease database is regularly updated based on data from the United States Genetic and Rare Disease Information Center (GARD). Diagnoses not yet in the disease database earn a unicorn icon to indicate the rarity.

Global Disease map
Search the global disease map to see where certain diseases are more or less rare. Find out how many RareGuru users share your diagnosis in any location.

RareGuru helps connect and support those experiencing rare diseases. Download today and join us.

The disease database is regularly updated based on data from the United States Genetic and Rare Disease Information Center (GARD). Users who have a rare diagnosis that is not in the disease database earn a unicorn icon to indicate the rarity.

Symptom Tracker
Track symptoms and take notes to evaluate your condition. You can export data trends for sharing with doctors and specialists.

Rare Disease and Chronic Illness Database
RareGuru‚Äôs disease database contains up to 7,000 rare diseases and chronic conditions and more than 21,000 symptoms. The disease database is regularly updated based on data from the United States Genetic and Rare Disease Information Center (GARD). Diagnoses not yet in the disease database earn a unicorn icon to indicate the rarity.

Global Disease map
Search the global disease map to see where certain diseases are more or less rare. Find out how many RareGuru users share your diagnosis in any location.

RareGuru helps connect and support those experiencing rare diseases. Download today and join us.
summary: Have a rare disease? You‚Äôre not alone. Connect, share, & learn on RareGuru.
developerAddress: 3800 W Bay to Bay Blvd #21, Tampa, FL 33629
recentChanges: Quick fix to correct an issue with user searches.
comments: I downloaded this app after seeing someone else with my rare disease post about it on Instagram. I have already connected with several people who have my same diagnosis!! I also like how you match on diagnosis and symptoms so if you're searching for a diagnosis, you might be able to find clues as to what's going on through symptoms you match on with other people who have been diagnosed. Hoping this will be a game changer for me ü¶ì

This app is pure gold for me. To be able to find a group of people who are matched to you, then be able to discuss and share a diagnosed rare disease or chronic illness with others who know your struggles is truly a Godsend. My family and I are so thankful to have found RareGuru!
Love the idea but it won't let me make an account....................

title: Best Fiends - Free Puzzle Game
description:
Be the HERO of the story! Join over 100,000,000 people who are already playing this top rated FREE puzzle adventure! Solve thousands of fun puzzles, collect tons of cute characters, and beat the bad guys as you discover the magical world of Minutia in the award-winning, original BEST FIENDS game!

* SOLVE THOUSANDS OF FUN PUZZLES Enjoy casual levels that are easy to play but hard to master!
* COLLECT CUTE CHARACTERS Build a team, level them up, and discover their special powers!
* PLAY DAILY EVENTS Win something new every time you open the game!
* COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FACEBOOK FRIENDS Earn massive rewards!
* EXPLORE A WORLD ON YOUR MOBILE Immerse yourself in dazzling graphics and finger-tapping music!
* DISCOVER FEATURE-FILM QUALITY ANIMATIONS Watch awesome Best Fiends content!
* STAY TUNED Lookout for regular updates bringing new levels, characters, and surprises!

STORY:
The little creatures of Minutia lived in peace and harmony until the meteor smashed into Mount Boom, bringing with it a strange force that transformed the Slugs who lived there into an army of greedy, greenery-gobbling pests. Now, the Slugs are taking over the world, munching a path through Minutia and sliming up everything they touch!

But a brave band of heroes is fighting back! Left alone when the Slugs conquered most of Minutia, these unlikely champions are on an epic quest to solve the mystery of Mount Boom and beat back the Slug advance. 

To get to Mount Boom, they‚Äôll need to become‚Ä¶ the BEST FIENDS!

PLEASE NOTE! Best Fiends is completely free to download and play but some game items may be purchased for real money. To disable this, turn off the in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings.

summary: Match and blast your way through 4000+ fun levels in this puzzle adventure game!
recentChanges:
PUMPKIN PICKING!
-Complete 30 Challenges and earn the fang-tastic Count Edward!
TRICK OR TREAT!
-Help Reapert with all tasks and he‚Äôll magically appear in your team to lurk there forever!
DAY OF THE DEAD!
-Finish 30 Adventures with Calavera Carmen and she‚Äôll join your team permanently.
NEW LEVELS EVERY WEEK!
-Stroll through the historic streets of Liberty Old Town with 10 NEW levels every Friday, Saturday, & Sunday!
comments: I think the developers are bored with this game. They seem to just be spewing out rehashes of levels and the only updates appear to be efforts to wind back rewards and get as much money as they can out out of players before they cut and run. From a good game to one of the most boring in a few updates. Got a few months free play then zip, uninstall. Don't bother, money grubbers. Not worth it.

I loved this game starting out but now that I'm in the 3000 plus levels I hardly win. The earthworm challenges are almost impossible to beat. Theres some fun little challenges but unless you can beat at least 10 levels you dont get the rewards. Be ready to spend a lot of money to buy gold to be able to beat levels. I've been playing since 2017 but I haven't hardly played in the last couple weeks. Probably gonna be uninstalling it very soon. Feels like more work than fun anymore

This game has become unplayable without buying gold. I'm on level 3650. You can spend hours doing one level which is boring. If they added one move each time you failed a level it wouldn't be too bad, but you have to fail numerous times before a move gets added. The league tables are a joke as well , instead of being called the "Championship of Great Britain" it should be called the "Championship of Who Can Afford the Most Gold". I used to love this game to the point of obsession, not now tho'.

It's a really fun, cute puzzler and the challenge is good. However I disagree with some of the micro transaction tactics. Constantly being left at the end of a level being 1 move short due to the RNG of the blocks dropping from the top where you need them to line up is very frustrating and you are tempted to buy extra moves with real money which I disagree with. The fiend styles are pretty cool though and are maybe worth buying to support the game. Not extra moves!

OMG, you keep changing how the game scores making it harder to earn points. Stop changing how points are earned. After 3 years of playing, I'm about to quit. I play games for fun and pleasure, not to be fustrated by playing a level repeatedly that can't be skipped. I'm going on a long break from this game. Hopefully you make it fun again when I come back. Also, File size is getting too big.

title: Mubeat for KPOP Lovers
description:
Mubeat for KPOP Lovers!
Mubeat is a platform just for KPOP fans all over the world to fan out to their favorite idols.

*Watching [Stream HD Videos of Your Artist]
-Videos from the past to the latest videos of your bias! Binge-watch music shows, variety shows, MVs, Mubeat original content clips in HD!

*Voting [Gift a 1st Place Spot to Your Artist]
-Fans all over the world can now participate in voting for not only the 1st place winner of Korean music show programs like Show! Music Core etc, but also vote on various contents in Mubeat Voting and vote to win the benefit of THE SHOW TV spot ad!

*Supporting [Celebrate Artist's Anniversary]
-Celebrate your artist's anniversary with other fans with Mubeat Fandom Ads through subway ads, rewarded video fandom ads, and more!

*Talking [Interact with Global KPOP Fans]
-Share artist's info and how you fan out to your favorite artist in the Community and interact with global fans!

[Main Functions]

üì∫ Your Very Own Hideout [Artist Channel]

Watch HD videos of your favorite artists like BTS, BLACKPINK, TWICE, Stray Kids, TXT, (G)I-DLE, SEVENTEEN, ATEEZ, ITZY, NCT, GOT7, etc, conveniently all in one place!
[Artist Channel] Follow artists and receive notifications on their latest ‚ú®HD KPOP‚ú® videos from various Korean TV channels!
From Focused CAMs, official MVs, music and variety shows from various Korean TV channels to Mubeat's original content videos~
Organized according to albums/members for your convenience!
Enjoy all these for free!

üí• Show Off the Power of Fandoms! [Voting]

‚úîÔ∏èShow! Music Core Global Voting- Fans all over the world, pre-vote in Show! Music Core Global Voting and gift your artist a 1st place spot!
‚úîÔ∏èMubeat Voting- Participate in superfun, Mubeat-exclusive content votings, and win a ton of benefits!
‚úîÔ∏èMubeat I.Q Voting- The artist I picked is going to answer my question? Get one step closer to your artist by voting for the artist you want to have a QnA with!

üéâTake Charge of Your Artist's Anniversary! [Mubeat Fandom Ads]

Birthdays, debut anniversaries, comebacks, and more. Celebrate these special anniversaries of your artist!
Various types of ads such as subway ads, rewarded video fandom ads and more are available to help make it an unforgettable day for your artist.

üó£ Shortcut to Becoming a True Fan [Artist Community]

Express and share your love for your bias with global KPOP fans who share the same interests as you. Because the more you share, the bigger the love grows!

üìà For the Real Fans [Mubeat Charts]

Stream your favorite artist's videos now and raise their chart rank. Video views are not only reflected in Mubeat Charts (real time), but also on Gaon Social Chart 2.0.

*Other Functions for Your Convenience

Subtitles, Vertical Screen Mode, Mini Player, Video Download, Full HD Videos, Voting Display Board Ad, Wall, KPOP Quiz, and more.

[Mubeat+ Benefits]

‚Ä¢ Unlimited Ad-Free KPOP Video Streaming
‚Ä¢ Unlimited Video Download
‚Ä¢ Other Device Connections on TV, etc

* Customer Service
If you are experiencing any issues or inquiries while using the app, please send to support@mubeat.tv.

*Get Closer with Mubeat!
-Official Website: https://www.mubeat.tv/
-Official Facebook: @mubeatTV
-Official Twitter: @MubeatTV
-Official Youtube: mubeatTV
-Official Instagram: @mubeat_kpop

recentChanges:
Mubeat Quiz Service Opened
- Mubeat quiz function has been added. Solve KPOP artist related quizzes. Obtain Heart Beats when you complete a quiz!
Other
- Bug fixes and minor services have been improved.
comments: It used to be the easiest voting app to watch ads from but the latest update is so frustrating. Why did they put 24-hour reset time? It's not everyday that we get free time during a certain hour. Say I've watched the first ad at 4pm today since I have a free time. Why do I have to wait until 4pm tomorrow to start watching ads again? I mean, it really lost its convenience. Please bring the reset time to 00:00 KST. It works well for everyone that way. Until then, I can only give one star.

I think this apps become worse after the latest update. I can't watch the ads even after 24 hours and the ads keeps unavailable. The worse is the notification said that I already reached my limit of watching ads when I did not even watch any. Please give back the old version since I did not have any problems with it before.

This is the most satisfying and smoothiest kpop based app I ever downloaded. It's actually my favorite kpop app like it's easy to watch ads and very easy to use. BUT! Please do something about video viewing here in the Philippines. I want to make the most of this app. Please do something about it... [EDIT: OCTOBER] Thank you very much for continuing the video viewing here in the Philippines! +üåü! And also the new update is truly the best! Thank you for always providing the best service possible

This is a great application before something went wrong, I can't watch my ads anymore, it's always says "There aren't ads available at this moment. Please try again later" even tho I didn't watch any ads today and the ads sign is still 0/15, please fix this problem, as soon as possible.

Normally I use the app while connected to WiFi but today I used data and when I opened the app all my account details were gone even my beats, I had to create another mubeat account which I did not like at all. The app worked great at first but now I don't know what is wrong with it. Please fix the app. (Edit: Thank you for responding, I have sent all the details you asked for and I hope my account will be retrieved soon )

title: Magic Piano by Smule
description:
From Bruno Mars to Mozart, play the hottest songs!
Relax your soul with beautiful sounds of piano while playing your favorite tunes on original #1 piano rhythm game. Featured by TIME, New York Times and Google Play Best Apps 2014.
 
Features
- New hits added daily - 1000+ hits across genres
- Adjustable difficulty level
- Rhythm and tempo control - recreate the music! 
- Sing! Jam - play along to featured artist's vocals
- Create your own music with our Composer. Find it in the main menu!

Current most popular songs (all genres):

** Let It Go - Disney's Frozen
** All of Me - John Legend
** On Top of the World - Imagine Dragons 
** Counting Stars - One Republic
** Cups - Anna Kendrick
** I'll Make Love To You - Boyz II Men
** Photograph - Ed Sheeran
** Stay - Rihanna ft. Mikky Ekko
** Bubbly - Colbie Caillat
** What Makes You Beautiful - One Direction
** Moves Like Jagger - Maroon 5
** Eye of the Tiger - Survivor
** The Magic Flute - Mozart
** Moonlight Sonata - Beethoven

Want a song that's not available? Suggest songs on Smule‚Äôs Facebook page: www.facebook.com/smule


PICK UP AND PLAY EFFORTLESSLY
Magic Piano makes you sound like a piano prodigy - any time, anywhere. Play your favorite songs with your own spin and sound great every time.
-Follow beams of light to guide your fingertips to the correct note. You control the notes, rhythm and tempo, allowing your creativity and expressivity to shine.

CONNECTING THE WORLD THROUGH MUSIC‚Ñ¢- SHARE YOUR PERFORMANCES
-Broadcast your performances on the in-app Smule Globe or listen to other players‚Äô songs and give their performances some love.
-Share your pieces through Facebook, Twitter and email.



www.smule.com
www.gplus.to/smule
www.facebook.com/smule
www.youtube.com/smule
www.twitter.com/smule

Please note: 

1) While you can use your existing Smule account with Magic Piano on Android, the content of the apps differ substantially, and consequently songs and Smoola are not shared between iOS and Android. Thank you for your understanding.

2) We unfortunately no longer support Android devices running an Android OS lower than 4.1. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Have questions on a particular permission?   http://www.smule.com/support/magicpiano#android

recentChanges:
Maintenance and Bug Fixes
Some minor adjustments to improve the app
comments: usually i really love this app it's like 5-stars-worthy. it has everything you want, you can play lots of already 'composed' songs but you can also make your own which is really fun. but lately there's bin this bug that it doesn't play the notes of yellow and orange dots all at once although i presse them. it's just super annoying and i've had that problem several times already. pls fix it!

I used to use this app years ago until they lost my account and do not respond to emails to recover all the songs I bought back then. I wanted to just try it again and it absolutely must be so graphic and sound intensive that it totally lags out on my moto z4. There is no way this app should require this many resources, I play very graphic intensive FPS game and I have no lag with them. Something is very wrong here. I'll just stick with playing my piano, it is a nice idea if it would work.

You're Not Going to Learn How to Play Piano however it feels like you almost are playing an instrument. When I first played Magic Piano it turned out to be harder than it looks. As I improved, the more fun it was to play. I love hearing new music and I especially enjoy learning how to play them. This would be especially fun on a road trip where you could pass your phone or tablet around the car for everyone to try.

Love this app but the updates have cause the game to really struggle on several note heavy stages. Seems like it's streaming the notes instead of downloading them like before which causes it to chug along and miss note presses. Tried on other devices and it's definitely a software issue.

This is an awesome game! It's just that it takes sooo long to unlock a song! The lowest price for songs is 25, and everytime we level up or complete an achievement, we only get 2 or 1! And it takes so long to level up or complete an achievement!

title: pCloud: Free Cloud Storage
description:
With pCloud you can store files from multiple devices to a one beautiful and intuitive cloud storage space. 

Upon joining we will present you with 10 GB FREE cloud storage! 

With pCloud you can:

- expand your phone's storage with up to 2 TB!
- backup all camera photos and videos automatically.
- sync files across all your devices.
- access your files even if you are offline.
- share files, track changes and statistics.
- encrypt your sensitive data with a military-grade client-side encryption - pCloud Crypto¬Æ.
- play music with a built-in audio player.
- upload quickly, regardless of the file size.
 

pCloud is also available for iOS, Windows, MacOS, Linux and any popular web browser. 

Read our Terms of service for full disclosure. 

Learn more about the permissions we use:
https://www.pcloud.com/help/android-help-center/what-permissions-does-the-android-app-require

recentChanges: Bug fixes and optimizations.
comments: The cloud itself is pretty fine, but the app is weak in terms of a cloud app. It can't check file checksum to see if the file already exists so that it doesn't re-upload it. Multi selection of the items are not possible, you should select them manually by hand, which is funny! Recently I've seen some instances of users complaining that pCloud or other 3rd parties scan your files to check if there are any so called "illegal" files and they terminate your account. This is the opposite of privacy!

No way to upload files and open new folders. Yet it reads: "created folder": "uploaded files". Network ok. Other fully functional apps. Update today 22/10/2020. Version2.11.2. But already with the previous version ie version 2.9.1 I had the same problems. But momentary, not like today. Thanks for the attention. Good job . In Trust I always leave 3 stars. GOOD DAY .Review update 22/10/2020 All solved for now. Thanks for the effort, the commitment and the seriousness. Let's go to 4‚≠ê

Looked far and wide, this is the best there is. If you are like me and have bunch of media on your external hdd which makes it very inaccessible to you. Then this is for you, the media streaming facility is excellent. I've compared it's lifetime plan against Google drive, idrive, purchasing a nas. It's without a doubt the most sensible choice.

Still now it's good to use. But one think I want to know,after installing day to now present time, how much MB (products) I upload on this "pCloud" free cloud storage,I found 1 thing is not going well, For ex:- supposed that, I upload 20 MB on this 'pCloud" store,but the problem is I see,everytime I upload any file any size,after completing upload,if I go settings-app & notification-click on this "pCloud" I see as much (MB/GB) upload on "pCloud" storage,this app size will also expend the same.

This company isn't able to repair a bug in the audio player reported 8 months ago. After I sent a reminder I got a reply saying: "Be advised that your feedback has been provided to the Android team months ago. You don't need to worry, we are already working on a new and improved Audio player." - That was in July, no change since then. They claim to be "a young forward-thinking team doing our best to make a significant impact on the rapidly growing IT market". Not like this, guys.

title: Tactical Monsters Rumble Arena -Tactics & Strategy
descriptionHTML:
Temporary Update Link: https://is.gd/Kc0Sxp

Tactical Monsters: Rumble Arena - A globally featured real-time & turn-based strategy action RPG on Google Play & a repeatedly honored mobile app on various gaming news media such as IGN, Pocket Gamer, Touch Arcade and Android Police

- A globally featured game by Google Play

Seeking a challenging new adventure that requires your cunning strategy and outsmarting tactics?

Experiencing fast-paced 3-5 minute strategy battles and whimsical gameplay in the world of Tactical Monsters comprised of fantasy monsters from all time and space. Whether you are competitive in real life or virtual reality, this is the ultimate competition game for you!

GAMEPLAY
Choose your perfect formation of tactical monsters and conquer the epic real-time multiplayer gameplay in this final fantasy war game. Outsmart and destroy your opponents by strategically positioning your monster heroes before battle and tactically controlling their actions in battle, even the auto chess battles!

FEATURES
‚óè Battle through different modes such as:
‚óè Unlock numerous PVE stages to win all 3 stars;
‚óè Set the optimal defense formations and layouts in Mine Defense Auto Chess;
‚óè Sharpen your tactics by visiting Monsters Academy;
‚óè Duel real players in real-time live PVP to take their thrones and claim the world treasure chest;
‚óè Endure through the Guerrilla Warfare Mode (Survival Mode) to defeat the never-ending BOSSES;
‚óè Collect, recruit and upgrade unique monsters:
‚óè Unleash a variety of powerful hero cards from Franky the Frankenstein, to fantasy monsters like Medusa and Griffin, to culturally established creatures like WuKong and the Mummy, to monsters you‚Äôve never seen before such as Bigfoot and Nobu the ghost samurai; Each one has its unique background, job and ridiculous destructive skill such as the world-ending skill ‚Äúthe nuclear warhead‚Äù from Dr. Walter‚Äôs Mecha Machine;
‚óè Play with friends from all over the world
‚óè Enter 1on1 matches with new friends worldwide;
‚óè Ally with your clan mates to chat tactical strategy knowledge, to share and to trade hero monster cards;
‚óè Build your own clan defenses to fend off the enemy raiders and rank for the #1 clan in the world!

PLEASE NOTE
‚óè Network connection is required, even the auto chess mode.
‚óè Tactical Monsters: Rumble Arena is free to download and play, some in-app items can also be purchased for real money. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device‚Äôs settings.

COMMUNITY
‚óè Email us at support@tacticalmonsters.com;
‚óè Follow us on Facebook to get news and updates: www.facebook.com/tacticalmonsters;
‚óè Join our Discord channel to chat strategy: https://discord.gg/XYHhgB4

*Get 500 FREE gems by joining our Discord group
*Tactical Monsters is fully developed, owned and operated by Camex Games.
*Camex Games partnered with Lemix Games to bring your favorite characters from Monster Castle.
